With a commitment to excellence and a dedication to customer satisfaction, Xendo Storage stands out as a trusted partner for those seeking top-tier storage solutions in the cloud native landscape.

Database and Data Services

Amazon RDS

Amazon RDS, a part of the Cloud Native Community, offers a robust set of database and data services to meet the diverse needs of the community. With Amazon RDS, users can easily set up, operate, and scale relational databases in the cloud, allowing for seamless data management and storage. This service provides a range of database options, from MySQL and PostgreSQL to Oracle and SQL Server, ensuring compatibility with a variety of applications and workloads. Additionally, Amazon RDS offers high availability, automated backups, and monitoring tools to optimize performance and ensure data integrity. By leveraging Amazon RDS, users can streamline their database operations and focus on building innovative solutions that drive business success within the Cloud Native Community.

Azure SQL Database

Azure SQL Database is a managed relational database service built for the cloud. It provides high-performance, secure, and fully managed SQL databases without the hassle of managing infrastructure. Azure SQL Database offers features such as automatic tuning, threat detection, and intelligent insights to optimize performance and enhance security. Additionally, it supports hybrid scenarios for seamless data integration between on-premises and cloud environments. With Azure SQL Database, organizations can scale their databases on-demand, achieve high availability, and leverage advanced security capabilities to protect their valuable data. Overall, Azure SQL Database is a powerful solution for modern database management in the Cloud Native Community.

Google Cloud SQL

Google Cloud SQL is a vital component in the realm of Database and Data Services within the Cloud Native Community. As one of the key players, Google Cloud SQL offers a comprehensive suite of database management services aimed at enabling seamless data storage and retrieval for organizations of all sizes. With its robust infrastructure and flexible scalability options, Google Cloud SQL empowers businesses to efficiently manage their data workloads while ensuring high performance and reliability. Its integration with the broader Google Cloud ecosystem further enhances its capabilities, allowing for seamless data integration and analysis across multiple platforms. In essence, Google Cloud SQL plays a pivotal role in driving innovation and efficiency in the realm of database management within the Cloud Native Community.

MongoDB Atlas

MongoDB Atlas is a key player in the Cloud Native Community, offering a comprehensive database service that allows for seamless scalability and high availability. With MongoDB Atlas, users can easily manage their data with built-in automation, monitoring, and security features. The service provides a reliable and efficient way for organizations to store and access their data in the cloud, making it an essential tool for modern data management. By partnering with MongoDB Atlas, companies can ensure that their data is secure, accessible, and easily scalable, helping them stay ahead in today's fast-paced digital landscape.

Amazon DynamoDB

Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service offered by Amazon Web Services. It provides high scalability, low-latency performance, and seamless integration with other AWS services. With DynamoDB, users can easily store and retrieve any amount of data and serve any level of request traffic. The service offers flexible data models, automatic scaling, built-in encryption, and data durability. DynamoDB is ideal for applications that require fast and predictable performance, such as gaming, finance, IoT, and social media platforms. By utilizing DynamoDB, organizations can focus on building their applications without worrying about managing database infrastructure.

Redis Enterprise Cloud

Redis Enterprise Cloud is a powerful database service that offers high-performance, scalable, and highly available Redis databases to meet the demanding needs of modern cloud-native applications. With Redis Enterprise Cloud, companies can leverage the speed and simplicity of Redis combined with advanced features such as active-active geo-distribution, automated failover, and seamless scaling.

One of the key benefits of Redis Enterprise Cloud is its seamless integration with the cloud-native ecosystem, allowing companies to easily deploy and manage Redis databases within their Kubernetes clusters. This deep integration ensures that Redis Enterprise Cloud can seamlessly scale and operate alongside other cloud-native services, providing a reliable and efficient data storage solution for modern applications.

In addition to its advanced features and seamless integration with Kubernetes, Redis Enterprise Cloud also offers robust security features to protect sensitive data. With encryption at rest and in transit, role-based access control, and audit logs, Redis Enterprise Cloud ensures that data remains secure and compliant with industry regulations.

Furthermore, Redis Enterprise Cloud provides companies with the flexibility to choose their deployment model, whether it's on public cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud, or on-premises infrastructure. This flexibility allows companies to adapt their database strategy to meet their specific requirements, whether it's optimizing for cost, performance, or data sovereignty.

Overall, Redis Enterprise Cloud is a valuable addition to the Cloud Native Community, offering a high-performance, scalable, and secure database solution that meets the evolving needs of modern cloud-native applications. By harnessing the power of Redis Enterprise Cloud, companies can drive innovation, accelerate development cycles, and deliver exceptional user experiences in today's fast-paced digital landscape.

Amazon Aurora

Amazon Aurora is a fully-managed and highly available relational database service that delivers the performance and availability of commercial-grade databases with the simplicity and cost-effectiveness of open-source databases. Aurora combines the speed and reliability of high-end commercial databases with the simplicity and cost-effectiveness of open-source databases. It is compatible with MySQL and PostgreSQL, offering up to five times better performance than standard MySQL databases. Aurora automatically scales storage and compute resources to meet your application needs, and provides continuous backup and point-in-time recovery for your data. With encryption at rest and in transit, Aurora ensures the security of your data while maintaining high availability with automatic failover and multi-AZ deployments. Amazon Aurora is the ideal choice for applications that require high performance, availability, and scalability without the complexity of managing a traditional database infrastructure.

PostgreSQL on AWS

PostgreSQL on AWS is a robust and scalable database service that allows businesses to store and manage their data efficiently. With features like auto-scaling and high availability, PostgreSQL on AWS provides a reliable platform for businesses of all sizes. By leveraging AWS's cloud infrastructure, users can benefit from secure and cost-effective data storage solutions. PostgreSQL on AWS is a popular choice for businesses looking to streamline their database management processes and ensure optimal performance for their applications. With continuous updates and improvements, PostgreSQL on AWS remains a top choice for organizations seeking a reliable and efficient database solution.

Azure Cosmos DB

Azure Cosmos DB is a globally distributed, multi-model database service provided by Microsoft Azure. It offers turnkey global distribution, multi-model support, and limitless scaling. Companies like Azure Cosmos DB provide critical services to the Cloud Native Community, enabling developers to build and deploy applications that require low-latency access to data across different regions worldwide. By leveraging Azure Cosmos DB, organizations can achieve high availability, consistency, and low latency required for modern cloud-native applications. As a part of the Cloud Native Community, Azure Cosmos DB plays a vital role in enabling businesses to innovate and scale their applications seamlessly on a global scale. Its robust features and capabilities make it a valuable asset for developers and organizations looking to leverage the power of cloud-native technologies.

Google Cloud Bigtable

Google Cloud Bigtable provides a fully managed NoSQL database service that is ideal for large-scale data analytics and real-time applications. It is designed to handle massive workloads with low latency and high throughput, making it a popular choice for companies looking to scale their storage needs seamlessly. Google Cloud Bigtable offers automatic scaling, replication, and seamless integration with other Google Cloud services, allowing businesses to focus on their data management and analytics rather than underlying infrastructure. With Google Cloud Bigtable, organizations can store and query vast amounts of data in a cost-effective and efficient manner, making it a valuable tool for companies in the Cloud Native Community looking to leverage big data for business insights and innovation.

CockroachDB

CockroachDB is a scalable and distributed SQL database that ensures data consistency and availability across multiple nodes. It provides horizontal scaling capabilities, allowing organizations to grow their data infrastructure without compromising performance. CockroachDB is a cloud-native database solution that leverages Kubernetes for orchestration and management, making it easier for developers to deploy and manage their databases on a cloud environment. With its advanced features such as automatic sharding, transactional consistency, and geo-replication, CockroachDB is a reliable choice for organizations looking to build resilient and high-performing applications in the cloud native ecosystem.

CockroachLabs

CockroachLabs is a key player in the world of database and data services within the Cloud Native Community. They offer innovative solutions that cater to the dynamic needs of modern businesses. Their technology is robust, scalable, and reliable, ensuring that data is managed with utmost efficiency and security. With CockroachLabs, organizations can confidently navigate the complexities of data management in the cloud-native space, empowering them to make informed decisions and drive growth. In a landscape where data is the lifeblood of every organization, CockroachLabs stands out as a trusted partner that delivers cutting-edge solutions for a cloud-native world.

Apache Cassandra

Apache Cassandra is a distributed NoSQL database management system designed to handle large amounts of data across many commodity servers, providing high availability with no single point of failure. Companies like DataStax, the primary supporter and contributor to the open-source Apache Cassandra project, offers enterprise-grade solutions and services around Apache Cassandra, enabling organizations to harness the power of this robust database technology for their data storage needs. Other companies in the Cloud Native Community that provide services around Apache Cassandra include Instaclustr, offering managed Apache Cassandra as a service, and The Last Pickle, a consultancy specializing in Apache Cassandra and DataStax Enterprise implementations. These companies play a vital role in enabling businesses to leverage the scalability and performance capabilities of Apache Cassandra for their data storage and management requirements, ensuring reliable and efficient access to valuable business information at scale.

Elasticsearch Service

Elasticsearch Service is a cloud-based managed service that enables users to easily deploy, secure, and scale their Elasticsearch clusters. It provides powerful search, analytics, and visualization capabilities, allowing organizations to unlock insights from their data. With features like automated monitoring, security analytics, and seamless integrations, Elasticsearch Service offers a robust solution for data management and analysis.

In the realm of Storage and Data Management within the Cloud Native Community, Elasticsearch Service plays a pivotal role in empowering businesses to efficiently store, search, and analyze their data. By leveraging Elasticsearch Service, organizations can simplify their data storage processes, improve search functionality, and enhance decision-making based on real-time insights.

As part of the comprehensive exposition of companies within the Cloud Native Community, Elasticsearch Service stands out as a key player in the realm of database and data services. Its innovative approach to data management and analytics sets a high standard for excellence within the industry. Through Elasticsearch Service, companies can harness the power of cloud-based solutions to drive operational efficiency, enhance data security, and accelerate business growth.

In conclusion, Elasticsearch Service's contributions to the Cloud Native Community are invaluable, offering a robust platform for data storage, search, and analysis. As organizations continue to embrace cloud-native technologies, Elasticsearch Service remains a trusted partner in enabling them to unlock the full potential of their data assets.

IBM Db2 on Cloud

In the realm of storage and data management, IBM Db2 on Cloud stands as a stalwart presence in the Cloud Native Community, offering robust and reliable services to meet the diverse needs of data storage and management. With IBM Db2 on Cloud, businesses can harness the power of cloud technology to efficiently store, organize, and access their critical data assets. The seamless integration of IBM Db2 on Cloud with other cloud-native tools and platforms ensures a smooth and streamlined data management experience for users. By leveraging the advanced features and capabilities of IBM Db2 on Cloud, organizations can optimize their data storage and management processes, ultimately driving enhanced operational efficiency and business performance.IBM Db2 on Cloud reinforces the foundation of cloud-native data management, providing a secure, scalable, and high-performance solution for businesses seeking to maximize the value of their data assets. As a trusted partner in the Cloud Native Community, IBM Db2 on Cloud continues to push the boundaries of innovation in data storage and management, empowering organizations to unlock new opportunities and achieve greater success in the digital age.

Oracle Autonomous Database

Oracle Autonomous Database offers a cutting-edge solution for enterprises seeking advanced data management capabilities within the Cloud Native Community. This trusted platform provides automated and self-repairing database services that ensure high performance, scalability, and security for mission-critical applications. With Oracle Autonomous Database, organizations can streamline their data operations, reduce manual tasks, and leverage AI-driven functionalities to optimize performance and drive innovation. By choosing Oracle Autonomous Database, businesses can seamlessly integrate their data resources, enhance productivity, and achieve greater agility in a dynamic digital landscape. Oracle's commitment to innovation and excellence makes it a valuable partner in the Cloud Native Community, empowering organizations to unlock the full potential of their data assets and stay ahead in a competitive marketplace.

MariaDB SkySQL

MariaDB SkySQL is a cloud database platform that offers advanced features for scalability, high availability, and security. With MariaDB SkySQL, users can easily deploy and manage databases in the cloud, with automatic scaling and failover capabilities. The platform also provides encryption at rest and in transit to ensure the security of data. Additionally, MariaDB SkySQL supports multiple data models, including relational, document, and columnar, making it versatile for various use cases. Overall, MariaDB SkySQL is a comprehensive solution for organizations looking to leverage the power of cloud-native databases for their applications.

YugabyteDB

YugabyteDB is a distributed SQL database that offers high availability and scalability for cloud native applications. It is designed to handle large amounts of data across multiple nodes, providing fault tolerance and low latency. With YugabyteDB, developers can build resilient and real-time applications that can scale with ease as data requirements grow. The database supports ACID transactions and distributed SQL queries, making it a versatile solution for modern cloud native environments. By leveraging YugabyteDB, organizations can ensure their data is always available and performant, enabling them to deliver innovative and reliable applications to their users.

Couchbase Cloud

Couchbase Cloud is an innovative database service that offers scalable and flexible solutions for cloud-native applications. This platform provides a fully managed NoSQL database that allows developers to store, manage, and query large volumes of data with ease. By leveraging Couchbase Cloud, organizations can benefit from high availability, seamless scalability, and strong data consistency, ensuring reliable performance for their applications. With a range of features such as built-in caching, powerful querying capabilities, and seamless integration with popular development tools, Couchbase Cloud is a valuable asset for businesses looking to optimize their data management strategies and drive innovation in the cloud-native ecosystem.

TimescaleDB

TimescaleDB is a powerful relational database built specifically for time-series data, a critical component in the world of cloud native computing. By leveraging SQL capabilities and scalability features, TimescaleDB provides seamless integration for storing and analyzing time-series data efficiently. Companies within the cloud native community can benefit from TimescaleDB's high performance, advanced data management tools, and ease of integration with existing systems. Whether it's monitoring real-time metrics, analyzing historical trends, or managing complex data streams, TimescaleDB offers a robust solution to meet the diverse needs of modern organizations in the cloud native ecosystem. With TimescaleDB, companies can make informed decisions, gain valuable insights, and drive innovation in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.

DataStax Astra

DataStax Astra provides a fully managed database-as-a-service built on Apache Cassandra, offering scalability, reliability, and performance for cloud-native applications. With DataStax Astra, developers can easily create, deploy, and manage distributed databases in the cloud without the need for complex infrastructure setup. By leveraging the power of Cassandra, Astra ensures high availability, fault tolerance, and seamless scalability for modern cloud-native applications.

DataStax Astra's cloud-native architecture allows developers to focus on building their applications without worrying about the underlying database infrastructure. With support for multi-cloud deployment, Astra provides flexibility and reliability for applications that need to operate across different cloud environments.

By offering a serverless experience, DataStax Astra enables developers to pay only for the resources they use, eliminating the need for upfront investments in hardware or infrastructure. This model allows for cost-effective scaling based on application demand, resulting in optimized performance and cost efficiency.

In addition to its core database functionality, DataStax Astra offers features such as data modeling, analytics, and real-time data processing, making it a comprehensive solution for cloud-native applications that require powerful data management capabilities. With advanced security features and compliance standards, Astra ensures the protection and privacy of sensitive data in accordance with industry regulations.

Overall, DataStax Astra provides a robust and scalable database solution for cloud-native applications, empowering developers to build, deploy, and scale their applications with ease and efficiency in the cloud-native ecosystem.

Redis Cloud

Redis Cloud is a prominent player in the Cloud Native Community, offering robust database services to meet the evolving needs of organizations. With Redis Cloud, users can harness the power of Redis, a lightning-fast, in-memory data store that provides real-time analytics, caching, and data processing capabilities. By leveraging Redis Cloud, businesses can scale their operations seamlessly, ensuring optimal performance and reliability for their critical applications. In a landscape where data is king, Redis Cloud stands out as a trusted partner for organizations looking to drive innovation and gain a competitive edge in the digital realm.

FaunaDB

FaunaDB is a leading cloud-native database service provider that offers a comprehensive and scalable solution for storage and data management. With FaunaDB, companies can securely store, manage, and retrieve their data with ease. FaunaDB is designed to handle large volumes of data in a distributed environment, making it an ideal choice for cloud-native applications. By leveraging FaunaDB, organizations can ensure high availability, durability, and scalability of their data while maintaining consistency and reliability. With its flexible and developer-friendly approach, FaunaDB empowers businesses to build robust and efficient cloud-native applications that meet the demands of modern digital ecosystems.

Firebase Realtime Database

Firebase Realtime Database is a fully-managed NoSQL database that allows you to store and sync data between your users in real-time. You can access this database directly from your client-side code, making it easy to build collaborative and real-time applications. Firebase Realtime Database provides offline support, allowing your app to remain responsive even when the network connection is unreliable. With Firebase Realtime Database, you can easily scale your app as your user base grows without worrying about managing infrastructure. It also provides powerful security rules that allow you to control who has access to what data in your database. Firebase Realtime Database is a key tool for developers looking to build dynamic and interactive applications that require real-time data synchronization.

InfluxDB Cloud

InfluxDB Cloud is a powerful tool in the realm of database and data services, offering a robust platform for managing and analyzing data in the cloud. With its cloud-native architecture, InfluxDB Cloud provides scalable and reliable storage solutions for organizations looking to optimize their data management processes. By leveraging the capabilities of InfluxDB Cloud, businesses can streamline their data workflows, gain valuable insights, and make informed decisions based on real-time data analysis. As a key player in the storage and data management space, InfluxDB Cloud plays a vital role in helping organizations harness the power of data to drive innovation, efficiency, and growth.

Heroku Postgres

Heroku Postgres, a cloud-based relational database service, offers managed PostgreSQL databases for application developers, eliminating the need for database management tasks. Developers can focus on building and scaling their applications while Heroku handles the database infrastructure. With features like continuous protection, performance analytics, and seamless scalability, Heroku Postgres streamlines database management and optimizes performance for cloud-native applications. Leveraging the power of PostgreSQL, Heroku Postgres provides a reliable and feature-rich database solution for the Cloud Native Community, ensuring data integrity, high availability, and ease of use for developers and organizations alike.

DigitalOcean Managed Databases

DigitalOcean Managed Databases offers a reliable and easy-to-use solution for businesses looking to store and manage their data in the cloud. With support for popular database engines like MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Redis, DigitalOcean provides a seamless experience for developers and IT professionals alike. Their managed databases are fully automated, with built-in backups, monitoring, and scaling capabilities to ensure high availability and performance. Additionally, DigitalOcean's robust security measures, including encryption at rest and transit, help protect sensitive data from unauthorized access. Whether you're running a small startup or a large enterprise, DigitalOcean Managed Databases is a cost-effective and efficient solution for all your data storage needs.

Cloudera CDP

Cloudera CDP is a leading provider in the realm of database and data services, offering cutting-edge solutions to meet the ever-evolving needs of the Cloud Native Community. Their comprehensive range of services caters to the diverse requirements of businesses seeking robust storage and data management solutions. By leveraging Cloudera CDP's expertise, organizations can harness the power of advanced technologies to drive innovation, enhance efficiency, and unlock new possibilities in the digital landscape. With a commitment to excellence and a focus on delivering value-driven outcomes, Cloudera CDP stands as a trusted partner for businesses looking to thrive in the era of cloud-native computing.

Databricks Unified Data Analytics Platform

The Databricks Unified Data Analytics Platform offers a wide range of database and data services to meet the diverse needs of the cloud native community. Companies such as Amazon RDS, Azure SQL Database, Google Cloud SQL, MongoDB Atlas, and Amazon DynamoDB provide robust and scalable database solutions for storing and managing data. Redis Enterprise Cloud, Amazon Aurora, and PostgreSQL on AWS offer options for high-performance and reliable data storage. Azure Cosmos DB, Google Cloud Bigtable, and CockroachDB provide globally distributed databases for seamless access and data consistency across regions.

For advanced analytics and processing, companies like Elasticsearch Service, IBM Db2 on Cloud, and Oracle Autonomous Database offer powerful tools for data mining and exploration. MariaDB SkySQL, YugabyteDB, and Couchbase Cloud provide flexible and scalable databases for modern applications. TimescaleDB, DataStax Astra, and Redis Cloud offer solutions for time-series data, real-time analytics, and caching.

With options such as FaunaDB, Firebase Realtime Database, and InfluxDB Cloud, developers can leverage specialized databases for specific use cases. Heroku Postgres and DigitalOcean Managed Databases offer convenient database-as-a-service solutions for easy setup and management. Cloudera CDP, Databricks Unified Data Analytics Platform, and Snowflake provide cloud-based data analytics platforms for processing and analyzing large datasets.

For data warehousing and business intelligence, companies like Teradata Vantage, Yellowbrick Data Warehouse, and Amazon Redshift offer scalable and high-performance solutions. Apache HBase, IBM Cloudant, and Microsoft Access provide NoSQL and document-based databases for flexible data modeling and storage. Azure Synapse Analytics, SAP HANA Cloud, and IBM Netezza Performance Server offer integrated analytics and data processing solutions for enterprises.

In the realm of database management and administration, companies like SingleStore, Hazelcast Jet, and CockroachDB Cloud provide tools for efficient data processing and management. EDB Postgres, Percona Servers, and MariaDB Foundation offer open-source database solutions for customization and control. Neo4j Aura, Microsoft SQL Server, and Apache Hive provide graph database solutions for relationship-rich data models. Treasure Data, MapR Database, and TIBCO Data Virtualization offer data integration and management platforms for seamless data processing and analysis.

These companies and services within the Databricks Unified Data Analytics Platform ecosystem are essential for empowering organizations to harness the power of data and analytics in the cloud native environment. With a diverse range of database and data services available, organizations can confidently build and scale their data infrastructure to drive innovation and growth.

Snowflake

Snowflake is a cloud-based data platform that allows organizations to store and analyze large amounts of data in a scalable and efficient manner. With features such as data warehousing, data lakes, and data sharing capabilities, Snowflake provides a comprehensive solution for businesses looking to harness the power of their data. By leveraging Snowflake's cloud-native architecture, organizations can access their data in real-time, perform complex analytics, and share insights with stakeholders across the organization. Snowflake's unique approach to data management has made it a popular choice among businesses of all sizes, from startups to Fortune 500 companies. With its secure and flexible platform, Snowflake is helping organizations drive innovation, make data-driven decisions, and stay ahead of the competition in today's rapidly evolving digital landscape.

Teradata Vantage

Teradata Vantage is a comprehensive database and data service that offers advanced analytics, machine learning, and AI capabilities to the Cloud Native Community. With Teradata Vantage, organizations can leverage powerful data management tools to drive insights, improve decision-making, and enhance business performance. Teradata Vantage is designed to handle massive volumes of data, enabling users to process, analyze, and visualize information with speed and efficiency. By integrating with other cloud-native technologies, Teradata Vantage provides a seamless solution for organizations looking to harness the full potential of their data resources. With its robust features and scalability, Teradata Vantage is a valuable asset for companies seeking to optimize their data management processes and achieve competitive advantages in the digital landscape.

Yellowbrick Data Warehouse

Yellowbrick Data Warehouse offers a highly scalable and high-performance data warehouse solution that is designed to handle large volumes of data and complex queries. With its innovative architecture and advanced features, Yellowbrick enables organizations to analyze their data faster and more efficiently than ever before. By providing a high level of performance, scalability, and reliability, Yellowbrick Data Warehouse empowers businesses to make data-driven decisions with confidence and speed. In addition to its impressive performance capabilities, Yellowbrick also offers a range of tools and features to help organizations manage their data effectively, ensuring that they can easily access and utilize their data resources. With its comprehensive suite of services, Yellowbrick Data Warehouse is a valuable asset for any organization looking to harness the power of their data and drive business growth.

Apache HBase

Apache HBase is a distributed, scalable, and highly efficient NoSQL database that is part of the Cloud Native Community. It is designed to handle large amounts of data in a fault-tolerant and reliable manner, making it ideal for big data applications and real-time analytics. With its architecture based on Google's Bigtable, Apache HBase provides fast read and write access to data, making it a popular choice for companies looking to store and analyze vast amounts of information. By leveraging HBase, organizations can achieve high performance and scalability while benefiting from its seamless integration with other cloud-native technologies. Apache HBase empowers businesses to unlock the full potential of their data and drive innovation in the digital era.

IBM Cloudant

IBM Cloudant is a fully managed NoSQL database service built for Cloud Native applications. It provides a highly scalable, distributed architecture that can handle large volumes of data and high transaction rates. With its built-in replication and data synchronization capabilities, Cloudant ensures data availability and consistency across multiple data centers and cloud regions. Additionally, IBM Cloudant offers a flexible JSON data model that allows developers to store and query data in a format that suits their application needs. This service is ideal for applications that require flexible and resilient data storage, such as e-commerce platforms, content management systems, and IoT applications. IBM Cloudant seamlessly integrates with other Cloud Native services and tools, making it easy for developers to build and deploy modern, cloud-based applications. By leveraging IBM Cloudant, organizations can achieve greater agility, scalability, and reliability in their data management practices.

Microsoft Access

Microsoft Access is a relational database management system that is part of the Cloud Native Community, offering data storage and management services to users. With Microsoft Access, businesses and individuals can easily create, manipulate, and query databases to store and retrieve information efficiently. The platform provides a user-friendly interface for developing database applications, making it a valuable tool for organizations looking to streamline their data management processes. Whether it's tracking inventory, managing customer information, or analyzing business performance, Microsoft Access offers a robust solution for storing and accessing data in the cloud. By leveraging the capabilities of Microsoft Access within the Cloud Native Community, users can benefit from enhanced scalability, reliability, and security for their database needs.

Azure Synapse Analytics

Azure Synapse Analytics is a fully integrated analytics service that blends big data and data warehousing. It offers limitless scaling and combines data integration, enterprise data warehousing, and big data analytics. With Azure Synapse Analytics, organizations can gain insights faster from all their data by leveraging a unified experience for developing end-to-end analytics solutions. Azure Synapse Analytics simplifies the complexities of big data, providing a seamless experience for data engineers, data scientists, and business analysts. This powerful service enables organizations to ingest, prepare, manage, and serve data for immediate business intelligence and machine learning needs. With Azure Synapse Analytics, you can unify your data warehouse and big data analytics solutions, creating a modern data lake architecture. By combining these capabilities, Azure Synapse Analytics empowers organizations to deliver actionable insights at scale, driving innovation and decision-making across the board. In the Cloud Native Community, Azure Synapse Analytics plays a vital role in enabling organizations to maximize the potential of their data and drive business success through powerful analytics solutions.

SAP HANA Cloud

SAP HANA Cloud offers a comprehensive range of database and data services that cater to the diverse needs of businesses in the Cloud Native Community. With advanced features and cutting-edge technology, SAP HANA Cloud stands out as a reliable and efficient solution for storage and data management. Companies can leverage SAP HANA Cloud to streamline their operations, enhance data analytics, and drive better decision-making processes. IBM Netezza Performance Server

IBM Netezza Performance Server, also known as Netezza Performance Software, is a data analytics platform that offers high-speed data warehousing capabilities for enterprises. With its massively parallel processing architecture, Netezza allows organizations to quickly analyze large volumes of data and gain valuable insights to drive informed decision-making. By leveraging advanced analytics and machine learning models, Netezza Performance Server enables businesses to optimize operations, improve customer experiences, and uncover new revenue opportunities. As a key player in the storage and data management space, IBM Netezza Performance Server contributes to the growing ecosystem of cloud-native technologies, offering scalability, performance, and reliability for modern data-driven applications. With its robust features and seamless integration with other cloud-native tools, Netezza Performance Server empowers organizations to harness the power of data and stay ahead in today's competitive business landscape.

With its high-performance database, integrated development environment, and advanced analytics capabilities, InterSystems IRIS empowers organizations to innovate and scale their operations effectively. As a part of the Cloud Native Community, InterSystems offers a comprehensive set of services to support developers, data scientists, and IT professionals in leveraging the full potential of their data. SingleStore

SingleStore offers a comprehensive database and data services solution that caters to the needs of the Cloud Native Community. By utilizing SingleStore's platform, companies can efficiently manage and analyze their data, ensuring optimal performance and scalability. With features such as real-time analytics, distributed SQL, and in-memory processing, SingleStore empowers organizations to make data-driven decisions with ease. Additionally, SingleStore provides seamless integration with popular cloud platforms, enabling users to leverage the benefits of modern cloud technologies. Overall, SingleStore's commitment to innovation and excellence makes it a valuable asset for any company looking to elevate their data management capabilities in the cloud native landscape.

Hazelcast Jet

Hazelcast Jet is a powerful data processing engine that harnesses the in-memory computing power of Hazelcast IMDG to deliver lightning-fast processing of large datasets. With Hazelcast Jet, organizations can effortlessly perform distributed data processing tasks with ease and efficiency. Whether it's real-time analytics, batch processing, or stream processing, Hazelcast Jet offers the scalability and reliability needed to handle diverse workloads seamlessly. By leveraging Hazelcast Jet, companies can unlock the full potential of their data and drive meaningful insights that propel business growth and innovation within the Cloud Native Community.

CockroachDB Cloud

CockroachDB Cloud is a robust database service that offers scalability and reliability for cloud-native applications. By leveraging distributed SQL technology, CockroachDB Cloud ensures high availability and strong consistency across multiple nodes, making it a top choice for organizations looking to scale their data infrastructure seamlessly. With features like automatic data sharding, intelligent data replication, and built-in security protocols, CockroachDB Cloud simplifies the management of data while providing optimal performance for modern applications. Whether you're handling large volumes of transactional data or managing real-time analytics, CockroachDB Cloud offers a comprehensive solution for storing and accessing your data with confidence. Join the Cloud Native Community and explore the services and offerings provided by CockroachDB Cloud to elevate your data management capabilities.

EDB Postgres

EDB Postgres, a key player in the Cloud Native Community, offers robust and scalable database solutions that cater to the diverse needs of modern enterprises. Their PostgreSQL-based offerings provide high performance, reliability, and flexibility, making them a popular choice for organizations looking to harness the power of cloud-native technologies. With EDB Postgres, businesses can seamlessly manage their data infrastructure, streamline operations, and drive innovation in today's fast-paced digital landscape. By leveraging EDB Postgres's services, companies can unlock new possibilities, enhance their competitiveness, and stay ahead in the ever-evolving realm of cloud-native computing.

MariaDB Foundation

MariaDB Foundation offers a robust and reliable database solution that is essential for the storage and management of data in the cloud native community. By providing a scalable and efficient platform, MariaDB Foundation plays a crucial role in enabling organizations to effectively store large volumes of data and access it in a secure and organized manner. With features like high availability, multi-master replication, and native GIS support, MariaDB Foundation empowers businesses to harness the full potential of their data in a cloud native environment. Furthermore, the ongoing development and support from the MariaDB Foundation ensure that users have access to cutting-edge technologies and continuous improvements to enhance their data storage capabilities. As a cornerstone in the cloud native ecosystem, MariaDB Foundation contributes to the seamless operation and success of businesses relying on cloud-based data management solutions.

Neo4j Aura

Neo4j Aura is a cloud service offering that provides a fully managed graph database. It is designed to handle complex and interconnected data with ease, making it ideal for applications that require real-time insights and powerful data visualization. With Neo4j Aura, businesses can leverage the power of graph databases without the need to worry about the operational overhead of managing infrastructure. This service is trusted by a wide range of industries, from e-commerce and social networking to fraud detection and recommendation engines. By harnessing the capabilities of Neo4j Aura, organizations can unlock the full potential of their data and drive innovation in their respective fields.

Microsoft SQL Server

Microsoft SQL Server is a pivotal player in the Cloud Native Community, offering robust database and data services to meet the diverse needs of organizations. With Microsoft SQL Server, users can leverage a powerful relational database management system that delivers high performance, scalability, and security. By integrating with the broader ecosystem of cloud-native tools and services, Microsoft SQL Server enables seamless data management and analysis in modern cloud environments. From data storage to analytics, Microsoft SQL Server provides a comprehensive solution for organizations looking to harness the power of the cloud for their data needs.

Apache Hive

Apache Hive is a data warehouse infrastructure built on top of Hadoop that provides data summarization, query, and analysis. It allows users to query large datasets stored in distributed storage using the SQL syntax familiar to most data analysts. Apache Hive is widely used in big data processing and analytics, making it a crucial tool in the cloud-native community for handling large-scale data processing tasks efficiently. With its ability to handle petabytes of data in a distributed environment, Apache Hive plays a vital role in enabling organizations to derive insights and make data-driven decisions. As a part of the cloud-native ecosystem, Apache Hive offers scalability, reliability, and flexibility in managing and analyzing vast amounts of data, making it a valuable resource for companies seeking to harness the power of big data analytics.

Treasure Data

Treasure Data provides an extensive range of database and data services to the Cloud Native Community. They offer a robust platform for managing, processing, and analyzing large volumes of data efficiently. With their solutions, organizations can leverage cutting-edge technologies to optimize their data storage and management workflows. Treasure Data's services are designed to meet the evolving needs of modern businesses, providing scalable and secure solutions for storing and accessing critical data assets. By partnering with Treasure Data, companies can unlock the full potential of their data resources and drive innovation and growth in the digital age.

MapR Database

MapR Database is a highly reliable and scalable database solution that is designed to handle large volumes of data and complex data processing tasks. It provides comprehensive data management capabilities, including data storage, retrieval, and analytics. MapR Database is built on a distributed file system architecture, allowing it to scale horizontally across multiple nodes and handle vast amounts of data efficiently. With its advanced features like multi-model data support, real-time data processing, and automatic data replication, MapR Database is a popular choice for organizations looking to manage their data effectively in the cloud-native environment. In addition to its robust database capabilities, MapR also offers a range of services and tools to support the deployment, management, and optimization of MapR Database in cloud-native environments. These services include data migration, performance tuning, security implementations, and ongoing support and maintenance. By leveraging MapR Database and its associated services, organizations can unlock the full potential of their data and drive insights and innovation in the cloud-native ecosystem.

TIBCO Data Virtualization

In the realm of cloud-native data services, TIBCO Data Virtualization stands out as a key player in facilitating seamless access to diverse data sources and simplifying data integration processes. TIBCO Data Virtualization enables organizations to overcome the challenges of data silos and complexity by providing a unified view of data across distributed systems. By virtualizing data resources, TIBCO empowers businesses to make informed decisions based on real-time insights and analytics, without the need for costly data replication or complex ETL processes.

Through its innovative approach to data management, TIBCO Data Virtualization offers a comprehensive solution for organizations looking to harness the power of their data assets. By abstracting and virtualizing data sources, TIBCO enables enterprises to securely access, integrate, and deliver data in a flexible and efficient manner. This not only accelerates time-to-insight but also enhances data governance and compliance, ensuring that sensitive information is handled with the utmost care and security.

In a landscape where data volumes are increasing exponentially and the need for real-time analytics is paramount, TIBCO Data Virtualization provides a robust foundation for building agile and responsive data architectures. By leveraging virtualization technology, organizations can adapt to changing business requirements, streamline data access, and drive innovation through data-driven decision-making. TIBCO's commitment to data excellence and customer success positions it as a trusted partner for organizations seeking to unlock the full potential of their data resources in the cloud-native ecosystem.

CouchDB

CouchDB, a part of the Cloud Native Community, offers a robust and flexible document-oriented NoSQL database that provides a distributed architecture for storing, querying, and indexing JSON documents. With CouchDB, developers can easily scale their applications and ensure high availability and fault tolerance. The service also supports replication and synchronization of data across multiple nodes, enabling seamless data access and consistency. Additionally, CouchDB's built-in conflict resolution mechanism ensures data integrity in a distributed environment, making it a reliable choice for modern cloud-native applications. By leveraging CouchDB, organizations can efficiently manage their data storage and retrieval needs in a scalable and resilient manner.

CassandraDB

CassandraDB, a popular choice for database services within the Cloud Native Community, offers a scalable and high-performance solution for storing and managing vast amounts of data. With its distributed architecture and fault-tolerant design, CassandraDB ensures data reliability and availability even in the face of hardware failures. This NoSQL database excels in handling large volumes of data across multiple nodes, making it ideal for applications that require fast read and write operations. Additionally, CassandraDB provides tunable consistency levels, allowing users to prioritize either data consistency or availability based on their specific needs. As part of the Cloud Native Community, CassandraDB continues to be a go-to solution for organizations seeking a robust and scalable database platform for their cloud-based applications.

PrestoSQL

PrestoSQL is a powerful, distributed SQL query engine that allows users to query data where it lives. It supports various data sources, including Hadoop, Amazon S3, MySQL, and many more. With PrestoSQL, organizations can run interactive queries against large volumes of data quickly and efficiently. This open-source project is widely used in the data analytics and business intelligence fields for its speed and scalability. By leveraging PrestoSQL, companies can unlock the full potential of their data and gain valuable insights to drive business decisions. As a key player in the storage and data management space, PrestoSQL is a valuable asset to the Cloud Native Community, offering innovative solutions for data processing and analytics.

Virtuoso

Virtuoso is a prominent player in the realm of database and data services within the Cloud Native community. As a provider of cutting-edge solutions, Virtuoso offers a wide array of services aimed at enhancing data management and storage practices for organizations operating in the cloud environment. With a sharp focus on innovation and efficiency, Virtuoso stands out as a key contributor to the community by delivering robust database solutions that meet the evolving needs of modern businesses. Through its comprehensive suite of offerings, Virtuoso empowers enterprises to harness the power of data effectively and securely, paving the way for enhanced operational performance and strategic decision-making. By leveraging Virtuoso's services, organizations can optimize their data infrastructure, streamline processes, and drive sustainable growth in today's fast-paced digital landscape.

Advanced SQL Engine

Advanced SQL Engine is a critical component in the realm of Database and Data Services within the Storage and Data Management landscape. The companies that are part of the Cloud Native Community offer a range of services and solutions to support this advanced SQL engine. These companies include market leaders such as Google, Amazon, Microsoft, IBM, and Oracle, as well as innovative startups like Cockroach Labs, FaunaDB, and YugabyteDB. Each of these companies brings a unique set of capabilities and expertise to the table, contributing to the evolving ecosystem of cloud-native technologies.

Google's Cloud SQL service leverages the power of the advanced SQL engine to provide a fully managed database service that is highly available, scalable, and secure. Amazon's Aurora database engine is another standout offering, combining the performance and availability of high-end commercial databases with the simplicity and cost-effectiveness of open-source solutions. Microsoft's Azure SQL Database is a cloud-based relational database service that offers built-in intelligence and industry-leading performance.

IBM's Db2 on Cloud service provides a fully managed SQL database platform that is optimized for cloud-native environments, while Oracle's Autonomous Database takes automation to the next level with self-driving, self-securing, and self-repairing capabilities. Cockroach Labs' CockroachDB is a distributed SQL database that is built to scale and survive in multi-cloud environments. FaunaDB offers a serverless, globally distributed database that is designed for modern application development.

YugabyteDB is an open-source distributed SQL database that is ideal for building cloud-native, multi-cloud applications. These companies and their advanced SQL engine offerings play a crucial role in enabling organizations to harness the power of data in the cloud-native era. By leveraging these services, businesses can unlock new insights, drive innovation, and deliver exceptional experiences to their customers.

Stardog

Stardog

Stardog is a leading provider of data management solutions that enable organizations to unlock the full potential of their data. They offer a graph-based data platform that allows users to store, query, and analyze large volumes of data with ease.

By leveraging Stardog's technology, organizations can create a unified view of their data, enabling them to make better-informed decisions and drive innovation. Stardog's platform is highly scalable and flexible, making it ideal for organizations of all sizes.

In addition to their core data management platform, Stardog also offers a range of services to support their customers, including consulting, training, and support. Their team of experts work closely with customers to help them get the most out of their data and achieve their business goals.

Overall, Stardog is a valuable partner for any organization looking to harness the power of their data and transform it into actionable insights. Their innovative solutions and dedicated support team set them apart as a top provider in the cloud native community.

Amazon Redshift

Amazon Redshift is a powerful cloud-based data warehouse service that offers high-performance and scalability for data analytics workloads. It provides columnar storage, parallel processing, and automatic compression to optimize query performance. With Redshift Spectrum, users can query data directly from S3, extending analytics to exabytes of data. Redshift also integrates with popular business intelligence tools like Tableau and Looker, making it easy to visualize and analyze your data. With features like automatic scaling and on-demand pricing, Amazon Redshift is a cost-effective solution for organizations of all sizes looking to unlock insights from their data.

Datical/DBmaestro

Datical and DBmaestro are essential players in the realm of database and data services within the Cloud Native Community. These companies offer cutting-edge solutions that cater to the intricate needs of modern businesses when it comes to managing and orchestrating databases effectively. Datical's innovative approach to database automation streamlines the deployment, monitoring, and overall management of databases, ensuring seamless integration and optimization within cloud-native environments. On the other hand, DBmaestro's robust platform empowers organizations to orchestrate and automate database processes, safeguarding data integrity and enhancing overall efficiency. Together, Datical and DBmaestro play a pivotal role in revolutionizing how databases are managed in the cloud-native landscape, providing unparalleled solutions to meet the dynamic demands of the modern digital era.

ScyllaDB

ScyllaDB provides a high-performance NoSQL database that boasts compatibility with Apache Cassandra while offering significantly higher throughput and lower latencies. This database solution is ideal for organizations looking to leverage distributed databases for their cloud-native applications, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval at scale. With ScyllaDB, users can benefit from a highly available and fault-tolerant database that is capable of handling large volumes of data with ease. By utilizing ScyllaDB in their cloud-native architecture, companies can achieve enhanced performance and scalability, empowering them to meet the demands of modern applications effectively.

CrateDB

CrateDB is a cutting-edge database management system that caters to the diverse needs of the Cloud Native Community. With its robust features and scalable architecture, CrateDB empowers organizations to efficiently store, retrieve, and analyze data in real-time. By leveraging CrateDB, companies can achieve enhanced performance, improved data governance, and streamlined operations. The seamless integration capabilities of CrateDB make it a valuable asset for businesses looking to harness the power of data-driven decision-making. In today's fast-paced digital landscape, CrateDB stands out as a reliable and innovative solution for data management requirements.

TiDB

TiDB, a distributed SQL database combining the high availability of traditional RDBMS with the horizontal scalability of NoSQL databases. TiDB is part of the Cloud Native Community, offering a robust and reliable solution for managing large volumes of data in a cloud-native environment. By leveraging a shared-nothing architecture and a Google-inspired Spanner/SpannerDB design concept, TiDB ensures data consistency and fault tolerance across distributed systems. With support for ACID-compliant transactions, SQL queries, and horizontal scalability through TiDB's architecture, companies can rely on TiDB to handle their growing data needs while maintaining high performance and availability. Operating as a cloud-native database, TiDB seamlessly integrates with Kubernetes and other cloud-native technologies, making it an ideal choice for organizations looking to deploy and manage their data in a scalable and efficient manner.

Aerospike

Aerospike is a prominent player in the field of database and data services within the Cloud Native Community. They offer innovative solutions that cater to the evolving needs of businesses in the digital age. With Aerospike, organizations can harness powerful data storage and management capabilities to drive efficiency, productivity, and growth. Their robust platform empowers users to store, retrieve, and analyze vast amounts of data with speed, reliability, and scalability. By leveraging Aerospike's cutting-edge technology, companies can unlock new opportunities, streamline operations, and stay ahead in today's competitive landscape. With a deep commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, Aerospike continues to set the standard for excellence in database services within the Cloud Native Community.

GridGain

GridGain is a leading provider of in-memory computing solutions that empower companies to achieve real-time data access and processing at scale. Leveraging their distributed in-memory computing platform, organizations can accelerate their applications, improve performance, and enhance scalability. GridGain's comprehensive suite of services includes data grid, compute grid, and a host of other features designed to meet the demanding needs of today's data-driven enterprises. By harnessing the power of GridGain, companies can unlock new levels of speed, efficiency, and innovation in their data management strategies. Join the Cloud Native Community and discover the groundbreaking services and offerings provided by GridGain for a future-ready data ecosystem.

Amazon Neptune

Amazon Neptune is a fully managed graph database service that makes it easy to build and run applications that work with highly connected datasets. It allows you to store and query billions of relationships with ease, providing high availability, durability, and scalability. Amazon Neptune supports both the popular graph query languages, Apache TinkerPop Gremlin and W3C's SPARQL, making it flexible for a variety of use cases. With Amazon Neptune, you can discover new insights, make recommendations, and optimize operations using the power of graph databases.

Being a part of the Cloud Native Community, Amazon Neptune offers seamless integration with other cloud-native services such as Amazon RDS, AWS Lambda, Amazon S3, and more. This allows you to leverage the full potential of your graph data within a cloud-native environment. Whether you are building recommendation engines, fraud detection systems, social networks, or knowledge graphs, Amazon Neptune provides the tools and services needed to succeed in the modern cloud-native landscape.

In addition to its core functionality, Amazon Neptune offers advanced security features such as encryption at rest and in transit, VPC isolation, IAM authentication, and more. This ensures that your data is protected at all times, meeting compliance requirements and industry standards.

Overall, Amazon Neptune is a powerful and versatile graph database service that is well-suited for cloud-native applications. By leveraging the capabilities of Amazon Neptune within the Cloud Native Community, you can unlock the full potential of your graph data and drive innovation in your organization.

Pivotal Greenplum

Pivotal Greenplum is a powerful, open-source, massively parallel processing (MPP) database that combines the benefits of traditional data warehousing with the flexibility and scalability of modern cloud-native technology. Pivotal Greenplum enables organizations to efficiently analyze and manage large volumes of data, making it an ideal solution for businesses looking to harness the power of real-time analytics and derive valuable insights from their data. With advanced features such as columnar storage, parallel processing, and support for SQL queries, Pivotal Greenplum is designed to handle complex analytical workloads and deliver high performance in demanding environments. As a part of the Cloud Native Community, Pivotal Greenplum offers seamless integration with cloud platforms and containerized environments, empowering organizations to effectively manage and analyze their data in a cloud-native ecosystem. By leveraging the capabilities of Pivotal Greenplum, businesses can unlock the full potential of their data and drive innovation, growth, and success in today's data-driven world.

VoltDB

VoltDB is a prominent player in the realm of database and data services within the Cloud Native Community. Known for its high-performance, in-memory database, VoltDB offers real-time analytics and transactional processing capabilities that cater to the demanding needs of modern applications. By leveraging a distributed, scale-out architecture, VoltDB ensures high availability and fault tolerance, making it a reliable choice for mission-critical workloads. With support for SQL queries and ACID transactions, VoltDB empowers organizations to unlock insights from their data in a fast and efficient manner, driving innovation and competitiveness in the cloud-native landscape.

Apache Drill

Apache Drill is a powerful tool within the realm of database and data services in the cloud native community. Offering a robust and scalable solution for querying and analyzing large datasets, Apache Drill stands out as a valuable resource for organizations looking to make the most of their data. With its ability to handle semi-structured and structured data from a variety of sources, Apache Drill provides flexibility and efficiency in data processing workflows. By enabling users to run SQL queries across different data sources without the need for data movement or transformation, Apache Drill simplifies and accelerates the analytics process. Its support for complex data models and its distributed query engine make it a versatile and indispensable tool for modern data-driven businesses. Whether you're dealing with log files, JSON, Parquet, or other data formats, Apache Drill streamlines the data analysis process and empowers organizations to derive actionable insights from their data with ease.

OmniSci

OmniSci is a prominent player in the realm of cloud native technology, offering cutting-edge services that cater to the needs of the community. With a strong focus on data management and storage, OmniSci has positioned itself as a key contributor to the evolution of cloud native solutions. By harnessing the power of their database and data services, OmniSci empowers organizations to efficiently manage and analyze vast amounts of data in real-time, enabling them to make informed decisions and drive impactful outcomes. Through their innovative approach and commitment to excellence, OmniSci continues to play a pivotal role in shaping the future of cloud native technology.

Exasol

Exasol is a leading provider of high-performance analytics databases, offering cloud-native solutions that cater to the ever-evolving needs of the modern data-driven organization. With Exasol, businesses can harness the power of in-memory processing and massively parallel architecture to analyze massive datasets in real-time, enabling faster and more accurate decision-making.

Exasol's commitment to the Cloud Native Community is evident through their comprehensive offerings, which include automated scaling, high availability, and seamless integration with Kubernetes and other cloud-native technologies. By leveraging Exasol's database solutions, organizations can unlock the full potential of their data, driving innovation and competitive advantage in today's fast-paced digital landscape.

In a world where data is king, Exasol stands out as a trusted partner for companies looking to extract actionable insights from their information assets. With a focus on performance, reliability, and scalability, Exasol continues to push the boundaries of what is possible in the realm of data analytics, empowering businesses to stay ahead of the curve and drive success in an increasingly data-driven world.

Actian Avalanche

Actian Avalanche provides cloud-native data management services to empower organizations with scalable and high-performance database solutions. As part of the Cloud Native Community, Actian Avalanche offers a comprehensive platform for storing, managing, and analyzing data in a secure and efficient manner. With Actian Avalanche, businesses can leverage cutting-edge technologies to unlock the full potential of their data while ensuring seamless integration with cloud environments.

Actian Avalanche's data services cater to the diverse needs of modern enterprises, enabling them to handle massive amounts of data with ease and agility. With a focus on speed, scalability, and reliability, Actian Avalanche is a trusted partner for organizations seeking advanced data management capabilities in the cloud.

With a commitment to excellence and innovation, Actian Avalanche continues to push the boundaries of what is possible with cloud-native data management, helping organizations thrive in the digital era. By leveraging Actian Avalanche's expertise and cutting-edge solutions, businesses can stay ahead of the curve and harness the power of data to drive success and transformation.

MarkLogic is a key player in the Cloud Native Community, offering robust database and data services to meet the evolving needs of organizations.
