MarkLogic's commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction positions them as a trusted partner for organizations looking to harness the power of data in the cloud-native landscape.

InterSystems Cach

InterSystems Cach is a powerful database management system that offers robust storage and data management solutions for organizations within the Cloud Native community. With features such as high-performance caching, real-time analytics, and advanced security measures, InterSystems Cach is a valuable asset for companies looking to optimize their data storage and processing capabilities. By leveraging the capabilities of Cach, businesses can ensure seamless integration of their data services, improve operational efficiency, and enhance their overall data management practices. As a key player in the Cloud Native ecosystem, InterSystems Cach plays a vital role in supporting the diverse needs of modern enterprises and empowering them to harness the full potential of their data assets.

RethinkDB

RethinkDB is an open-source, NoSQL database that is designed for real-time applications. It provides seamless scalability, high availability, and automatic sharding, making it a popular choice for businesses looking to handle data-intensive workloads with ease. RethinkDB's unique feature is its real-time push architecture, which allows applications to receive updates as soon as they occur in the database.

RethinkDB is highly reliable, with built-in support for automatic failover and data redundancy to ensure data integrity and availability at all times. Its query language, ReQL, is user-friendly and powerful, enabling developers to build complex queries easily. RethinkDB also comes with a web-based admin interface, making it simple to manage and monitor database operations.

In addition to its robust features, RethinkDB is well-suited for applications that require real-time data processing, such as chat applications, monitoring systems, and live collaboration tools. Its ability to handle large volumes of data and deliver updates instantaneously makes it a top choice for modern, data-driven applications in the cloud-native ecosystem.

Overall, RethinkDB is a key player in the cloud-native database landscape, providing developers with a versatile and high-performance solution for their data storage and management needs. With its focus on real-time capabilities and scalability, RethinkDB continues to be a valuable asset for businesses seeking efficient and reliable database solutions in the cloud-native community.

Uhuru Cloud Commander

Uhuru Cloud Commander offers a comprehensive set of database and data services tailored to the needs of the Cloud Native Community. With a focus on storage and data management, Uhuru Cloud Commander provides a range of solutions designed to optimize data storage and retrieval processes. From efficient container storage solutions like OpenEBS and Rook to cutting-edge database services such as Amazon RDS and Google Cloud SQL, Uhuru Cloud Commander is at the forefront of database and data management innovation. By leveraging their expertise and advanced technologies, Uhuru Cloud Commander empowers organizations to harness the full potential of their data resources, ensuring scalability, efficiency, and reliability in a cloud-native environment.

Memcached

Memcached is a high-performance, distributed memory caching system that is used to store key-value data. It is commonly used to speed up dynamic web applications by alleviating the burden on the database. Some companies that provide Memcached services in the Cloud Native Community include AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, and IBM Cloud. These services offer seamless integration with other cloud services, scalability, and high availability to ensure optimal performance for applications utilizing Memcached. By leveraging these cloud providers' offerings, developers can easily implement and manage Memcached instances, enabling faster access to cached data and improved overall application performance.

SAP IQ

SAP IQ is a leading database management system that offers comprehensive data storage and processing capabilities to support the cloud native community. With its robust features and advanced functionalities, SAP IQ provides a reliable platform for organizations to store, manage, and analyze their data effectively.

By leveraging SAP IQ, companies can benefit from enhanced data security, scalability, and performance, making it an ideal choice for cloud native applications. With its seamless integration with other cloud services and technologies, SAP IQ ensures a smooth and efficient data management process for businesses of all sizes.

Overall, SAP IQ plays a crucial role in the storage and data management landscape within the cloud native community, offering unparalleled support and capabilities for organizations looking to optimize their data operations.

SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise

SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise, also known as SAP ASE, is a leading database management system that provides robust data management solutions for enterprises. SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise offers high-performance, scalable, and secure data storage capabilities, making it a valuable asset for organizations looking to optimize their data management processes. With SAP ASE, businesses can efficiently handle large volumes of data, ensure data integrity, and streamline data processing workflows. As a key player in the storage and data management sector of the Cloud Native Community, SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise plays a crucial role in empowering businesses to harness the power of their data effectively and drive innovation across various industries.

IBM Db2 Event Store

The IBM Db2 Event Store is a cutting-edge data management solution that empowers enterprises to efficiently capture, analyze, and act on large volumes of data in real-time. This state-of-the-art platform offers advanced functionalities for ingesting, processing, and storing data streams at scale. By leveraging the IBM Db2 Event Store, organizations can streamline their data analytics processes and derive valuable insights to drive strategic decision-making. With its robust feature set and flexible deployment options, the IBM Db2 Event Store is a valuable asset for businesses looking to harness the power of real-time data processing and analysis.

Storage and Data Management

Container Storage

OpenEBS

OpenEBS is a crucial player in the realm of container storage within the Cloud Native Community. Their innovative solutions cater to the growing storage needs of modern applications, providing scalable and efficient storage management within Kubernetes environments. With OpenEBS, organizations can seamlessly manage storage resources, ensuring high availability, data protection, and resilience for critical workloads. By leveraging OpenEBS, businesses can optimize their storage infrastructure, streamline operations, and enhance overall performance, making it a valuable asset in the Cloud Native ecosystem.

Rook

Rook is another prominent player in the field of container storage within the Cloud Native Community. Rook provides a robust solution for managing storage in containerized environments by enabling users to deploy and manage storage solutions directly within their Kubernetes clusters. This seamless integration with Kubernetes allows for the dynamic provisioning, scaling, and management of storage resources, ensuring optimal performance and reliability for containerized applications.

With Rook, users can leverage various storage backends such as Ceph, EdgeFS, and NFS to meet their specific storage requirements. Rook ensures data resiliency and availability through features like data replication, automated failover, and dynamic volume provisioning. This level of flexibility and control empowers organizations to build and scale storage infrastructure tailored to their needs without the complexities typically associated with traditional storage solutions.

Furthermore, Rook's open-source nature and active community support make it a popular choice among users looking to harness the power of cloud-native storage solutions. The platform is continuously evolving and improving, driven by community contributions and feedback, ensuring that users have access to the latest innovations and best practices in container storage management.

In conclusion, Rook stands as a reliable and versatile option for organizations seeking efficient and scalable storage solutions for their containerized workloads. Its seamless integration with Kubernetes, broad range of storage backends, and strong community support make it a valuable asset in the Cloud Native landscape, enabling users to effectively manage their storage infrastructure and drive innovation in their application development processes.

Longhorn

Longhorn is a highly reliable and efficient container storage solution that caters to the needs of the Cloud Native Community. With its robust features and seamless integration capabilities, Longhorn provides a scalable and high-performance storage platform for modern applications. By offering data persistence and protection, Longhorn ensures that critical data remains secure and accessible at all times. Its distributed block storage system allows for easy and flexible management of storage resources, making it an essential component for organizations looking to optimize their cloud-native infrastructure. With Longhorn's comprehensive set of services and offerings, users can confidently deploy and manage their containerized applications with ease and confidence.

Portworx

Portworx is a key player in the container storage space, providing scalable storage solutions designed specifically for cloud-native applications. With Portworx, organizations can easily manage their data storage needs within a Kubernetes environment, ensuring high availability, data protection, and hybrid cloud flexibility. By leveraging Portworx's storage capabilities, companies can seamlessly deploy and run stateful workloads in containerized environments without compromising on performance or reliability. Portworx's innovative approach to container storage has made them a valuable partner within the Cloud Native Community, offering cutting-edge solutions to meet the evolving storage requirements of today's modern applications.

Ceph

Ceph provides scalable, high-performance storage solutions for containerized environments within the Cloud Native Community. With its distributed architecture and ability to handle petabytes of data, Ceph offers a reliable storage option for organizations looking to manage large volumes of data within their containerized workloads. By leveraging Ceph's object storage, block storage, and file system capabilities, companies can ensure that their data is accessible, secure, and easily scalable as their needs grow. As a key player in the cloud-native storage landscape, Ceph plays a crucial role in enabling companies to effectively manage their storage infrastructure and meet the demands of modern containerized applications.

GlusterFS

GlusterFS is a popular choice for container storage within the Cloud Native Community due to its scalability and flexibility. Many companies offer services and solutions based on GlusterFS to support the diverse storage needs of containerized applications. These companies include Red Hat OpenShift Container Storage, which provides integrated storage solutions for OpenShift deployments; Dell EMC PowerFlex, offering high-performance storage solutions for Kubernetes environments; Pure Storage, known for its innovative flash storage technology; and Linbit LINSTOR, providing robust storage solutions for containerized workloads. Other notable players in the GlusterFS ecosystem include DataCore SANsymphony, Quobyte, Robin Cloud Native Storage, and Diamanti, each offering unique features and capabilities to meet the evolving storage requirements of cloud-native applications. Regardless of the specific needs or scale of your storage infrastructure, there are various vendors and solutions available within the GlusterFS ecosystem to help optimize your container storage environment and enable seamless data management for your cloud-native workloads.

StorageOS

StorageOS is a prominent provider in the Container Storage sector of the Cloud Native Community. They offer innovative solutions for storage management within containerized environments. StorageOS aims to enhance data protection, scalability, and efficiency for cloud-native applications. By leveraging their technology, organizations can optimize storage resources and ensure seamless data management in dynamic containerized infrastructures. StorageOS' commitment to excellence and continuous improvement positions them as a key player in the realm of container storage solutions within the Cloud Native ecosystem.

CSI (Container Storage Interface)

Some of the notable companies providing Container Storage Interface (CSI) solutions within the Cloud Native Community include OpenEBS, Rook, Longhorn, Portworx, Ceph, GlusterFS, StorageOS, Rancher Longhorn, NetApp Trident, ONTAP AI, Red Hat OpenShift Container Storage, IBM Spectrum Scale, VMware vSAN, AWS EBS, Azure Disk Storage, Google Persistent Disk, Dell EMC PowerFlex, Pure Storage, Linbit LINSTOR, DataCore SANsymphony, Quobyte, Robin Cloud Native Storage, Diamanti, MayaData, Stork, Velero, MinIO, Nexenta, Hammerspace, GlusterD, Datera, MitsuMaru, IBM Cloud Block Storage, Hitachi Vantara, Fungible Storage Cluster, Elastifile, SUSE Enterprise Storage, Storj, Pomerium, DDN Storage, Dell Technologies Container Storage Modules, Azure NetApp Files, Alibaba Cloud Container Storage, Nutanix Karbon, OpenStack Cinder, NetApp SolidFire, Panasas, Western Digital OpenFlex, NexentaStor, Qumulo, and many others. These companies offer a wide range of storage solutions aimed at meeting the diverse needs of the cloud-native community, ensuring reliable and efficient data management for modern applications and workloads.

Rancher Longhorn

Rancher Longhorn, a key player in the Container Storage segment of the Storage and Data Management landscape, offers innovative solutions that cater to the evolving needs of the Cloud Native Community. By providing robust storage options, Rancher Longhorn ensures seamless data management and accessibility for organizations embracing cloud-native technologies. With a focus on scalability, reliability, and performance, Longhorn empowers users to optimize their data storage strategies and drive efficiency in their operations. As a part of the comprehensive offerings within the Cloud Native Community, Rancher Longhorn plays a crucial role in enabling businesses to harness the power of containerized environments and unlock new possibilities in the digital era.

NetApp Trident

NetApp Trident, a leading player in the container storage space, offers seamless integration with Kubernetes environments, providing scalable storage solutions for containerized applications. With Trident, users can easily provision, manage, and automate storage resources, ensuring high availability and performance for their Kubernetes workloads. By leveraging NetApp's advanced data management capabilities, organizations can streamline their container storage operations, optimize resource utilization, and simplify the deployment of stateful applications in the cloud-native ecosystem. With NetApp Trident, companies can unlock the full potential of their Kubernetes clusters and drive innovation in the rapidly evolving cloud-native landscape.

ONTAP AI is a cutting-edge solution that provides advanced container storage capabilities to enhance data management in the Cloud Native Community. As part of the comprehensive exposition of companies within this community, ONTAP AI stands out for its innovative approach to storage and data processing. By leveraging the power of artificial intelligence and machine learning, ONTAP AI delivers unmatched performance and efficiency for handling data-intensive workloads. Red Hat OpenShift Container Storage

Red Hat OpenShift Container Storage is a key player in the world of container storage solutions. This innovative technology provides a robust and reliable storage platform for businesses looking to leverage the power of containers for their applications. With Red Hat OpenShift Container Storage, organizations can easily manage their data in a containerized environment, ensuring high availability and seamless scalability. This solution integrates seamlessly with Red Hat's OpenShift platform, providing a comprehensive storage solution that meets the demands of modern businesses. By leveraging Red Hat OpenShift Container Storage, companies can optimize their storage infrastructure, improve performance, and streamline their operations for greater efficiency and agility.

IBM Spectrum Scale

IBM Spectrum Scale is a robust and scalable container storage solution that plays a critical role in the Cloud Native Community. By offering seamless integration with containerized environments, IBM Spectrum Scale enables organizations to efficiently manage and store data within their cloud-native ecosystems. With features such as automatic data placement, dynamic tiering, and native encryption, IBM Spectrum Scale provides a comprehensive storage solution that meets the unique needs of modern cloud-native applications. This powerful platform empowers organizations to effectively leverage the benefits of containerization while ensuring data integrity, security, and accessibility in a cloud-native environment. With IBM Spectrum Scale, companies can harness the full potential of their containerized applications and drive innovation in the ever-evolving landscape of cloud-native technology.

VMware vSAN

VMware vSAN is a robust container storage solution that offers scalable and high-performance storage capabilities for cloud-native applications. It provides seamless integration with Kubernetes clusters, ensuring efficient storage management and data persistence for containerized workloads. With VMware vSAN, developers can easily provision storage resources, replicate data for resilience, and dynamically resize storage volumes to meet the demands of their applications. This seamless integration with Kubernetes clusters empowers developers to focus on building and deploying applications without worrying about the underlying storage infrastructure. VMware vSAN is a key player in the Cloud Native Community, offering cutting-edge storage solutions that enable organizations to accelerate their digital transformation journey and achieve greater agility and scalability in their cloud-native environments.

AWS EBS (Elastic Block Store)

AWS Elastic Block Store (EBS) provides scalable block storage for use with Amazon EC2 instances. It offers high availability and durability, with the ability to automatically replicate data across multiple Availability Zones. EBS volumes are designed for critical applications that require low-latency access to data. By leveraging EBS, organizations can ensure their data is secure and easily accessible, enabling them to focus on driving innovation and growth in the cloud-native landscape.

As part of the Cloud Native Community, AWS EBS plays a crucial role in supporting the infrastructure needs of businesses across various industries. By offering flexible and reliable storage solutions, AWS EBS empowers organizations to build and scale their applications with confidence. With features such as snapshot backups, encryption, and Elastic Volumes, AWS EBS delivers the performance and security required to meet the demands of modern cloud environments.

Whether it's powering mission-critical databases, running enterprise applications, or storing large datasets, AWS EBS provides the storage foundation needed to drive business success in the cloud. With a wide range of volume types to choose from, including General Purpose SSD, Provisioned IOPS SSD, and Throughput Optimized HDD, AWS EBS offers the flexibility and performance required to meet diverse workload requirements.

In today's fast-paced digital landscape, having reliable and scalable storage is essential for organizations looking to stay competitive. With AWS EBS, businesses can leverage the power of cloud-native technology to unlock new possibilities and drive innovation. As a trusted member of the Cloud Native Community, AWS EBS continues to support the evolving needs of modern enterprises, helping them to succeed in an increasingly digital world.

Azure Disk Storage

Azure Disk Storage is a crucial component of the container storage ecosystem within the Cloud Native Community. With Azure Disk Storage, companies can securely store and manage their data in the cloud, ensuring high availability and reliable performance for their containerized applications. Azure Disk Storage offers various options for block storage, including Standard HDD, Standard SSD, Premium SSD, and Ultra Disk Storage, allowing organizations to choose the right storage solution based on their performance and cost requirements. By leveraging Azure Disk Storage, companies can effectively scale their storage resources, optimize their data management processes, and ensure seamless integration with their containerized environments. Azure Disk Storage is a valuable asset for organizations looking to enhance their storage capabilities within the Cloud Native Community.

Google Persistent Disk

Google Persistent Disk provides reliable and high-performance block storage for virtual machines running on Google Cloud Platform. It offers scalable storage options and persistent disk capabilities that ensure data durability and accessibility for your applications. With Google Persistent Disk, you can easily attach and detach disks to your virtual machines, back up your data, and efficiently manage storage resources. This service is a crucial component of Google Cloud's storage offerings, providing the foundation for running and storing data on the cloud seamlessly. As part of the Cloud Native Community, Google Persistent Disk plays a vital role in enabling organizations to leverage the benefits of cloud storage solutions for their applications and workloads. It offers the flexibility, scalability, and reliability required to meet the demands of modern cloud-native environments, empowering businesses to innovate and succeed in the digital era.

Dell EMC PowerFlex

Dell EMC PowerFlex offers a robust container storage solution that integrates seamlessly within the Cloud Native Community. Their innovative approach provides efficient and scalable storage capabilities to support the dynamic needs of modern cloud environments. With Dell EMC PowerFlex, organizations can confidently deploy and manage their containerized applications while ensuring high performance and reliability. This strategic collaboration enhances the overall storage and data management offerings within the Cloud Native Community, empowering organizations to harness the full potential of cloud-native technologies for their business operations. Dell EMC PowerFlex stands as a key player in revolutionizing container storage solutions, driving innovation, and enabling a more streamlined and efficient cloud-native ecosystem for all users.

Stork

Stork is a prominent player in the container storage landscape, offering cutting-edge solutions for data management in cloud-native environments. Their innovative technology is designed to meet the evolving needs of modern businesses, providing seamless integration and robust performance. Stork's commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction sets them apart as a trusted partner for companies looking to optimize their storage infrastructure. With Stork, organizations can harness the power of container storage to drive efficiency, agility, and scalability in their operations.

Velero

Velero, formerly known as Heptio Ark, is an open-source tool that provides backup and restore capabilities for Kubernetes cluster resources. It allows users to easily back up their entire cluster or specific namespaces, applications, or volumes to various storage solutions, including cloud storage providers like AWS S3, Google Cloud Storage, and Azure Blob Storage. Velero helps ensure that your valuable data is protected and can be restored in case of accidental deletion, data corruption, or cluster failure. With Velero, you can schedule regular backups, create custom backup policies, and manage retention policies to optimize storage usage. This tool is essential for data protection and disaster recovery in Kubernetes environments, providing peace of mind for cluster administrators and developers alike.

MinIO

MinIO is a leading provider of container storage solutions within the Cloud Native Community. Their innovative approach to storage management enables organizations to efficiently store and retrieve data in a scalable and secure manner. With MinIO, companies can ensure high availability and durability of their data while maintaining optimal performance levels. By leveraging MinIO's container storage technology, businesses can streamline their data management processes and drive greater operational efficiency. MinIO's commitment to excellence in container storage solutions makes them a valuable asset to the Cloud Native Community, offering cutting-edge services that meet the evolving needs of modern organizations.

Nexenta is a key player in the cloud native community, providing essential container storage solutions for organizations looking to optimize their data management strategies. With a focus on scalability and efficiency, Nexenta offers a comprehensive suite of services that cater to the diverse needs of modern businesses. They offer cutting-edge solutions that cater to the dynamic storage needs of modern applications running in containers. With Elastifile, organizations can confidently navigate the complexities of storage in the cloud-native landscape, unlocking new possibilities for innovation and growth. Their commitment to excellence and innovation makes them a valuable asset to the community, driving the evolution of storage solutions within the cloud-native ecosystem.

Dell Technologies Container Storage Modules

Dell Technologies offers a range of versatile container storage modules that cater to the evolving needs of the Cloud Native Community. These modules are designed to seamlessly integrate into various cloud environments, providing high-performance storage solutions that can scale with your growing requirements.

Their container storage modules are equipped with advanced features such as data deduplication, snapshotting, and replication, ensuring data integrity and reliability. With support for industry-standard protocols and interfaces, Dell Technologies container storage modules can easily interface with existing infrastructure and applications.

Whether you are managing data for AI/ML workloads, distributed databases, or high-transactional applications, Dell Technologies container storage modules offer the flexibility and performance needed to meet the demands of modern cloud-native environments. By leveraging these modules, organizations can optimize their storage resources, improve data accessibility, and enhance overall operational efficiency in the cloud-native landscape.

Azure NetApp Files

Azure NetApp Files, a service offered by Microsoft Azure, provides high-performance file storage for cloud-based applications. It allows users to seamlessly move their on-premises file-based applications to the cloud without compromising performance. With Azure NetApp Files, organizations can leverage the power of NetApp technology to run enterprise applications like SAP, Oracle, and SQL Server in the cloud with ease.

By utilizing Azure NetApp Files, users can achieve sub-millisecond latency for their workloads, ensuring optimal performance and scalability. This service offers advanced data protection features, such as built-in redundancy and snapshot capabilities, to safeguard critical data and ensure business continuity. Additionally, Azure NetApp Files is fully integrated with Azure, enabling seamless collaboration and compatibility with other Azure services.

Overall, Azure NetApp Files provides organizations with a reliable and efficient solution for managing their file-based workloads in the cloud. With its high-performance capabilities and robust data protection features, this service is a valuable asset for companies looking to modernize their infrastructure and harness the full potential of the cloud-native ecosystem.

This service provides dynamic provisioning, snapshot capabilities, and data redundancy options to meet the diverse storage needs of modern cloud-native applications. Leveraging the power of Alibaba Cloud's infrastructure, Container Storage delivers high-performance block and file storage for demanding workloads, making it a valuable asset for organizations seeking efficient and cost-effective storage solutions in the cloud-native ecosystem.

Docker Volume Plugins

Docker Volume Plugins play a crucial role in the realm of Container Storage within the broader landscape of Storage and Data Management in the Cloud Native Community. These plugins enable Docker containers to persist data beyond the container lifecycle, allowing for seamless data management and storage across various cloud environments. By integrating with different storage solutions, Docker Volume Plugins enhance the flexibility and scalability of containerized applications, providing a robust foundation for data-driven initiatives within the community. Companies offering Docker Volume Plugins contribute to the continual advancement of cloud-native technologies, shaping the future of data storage and management in the digital age.

NFS (Network File System) for Kubernetes

NFS, or Network File System, plays a crucial role in the realm of container storage within the broader landscape of storage and data management for Kubernetes environments. NFS enables seamless sharing of files across a network, providing a centralized location for data storage accessible to multiple users and applications. In the context of Kubernetes, NFS solutions facilitate the storage of persistent data volumes that can be dynamically provisioned and mounted to containers as needed.

Various companies within the Cloud Native Community offer NFS solutions tailored to Kubernetes environments. These solutions ensure reliable and scalable storage capabilities for containerized applications, enabling seamless data management within Kubernetes clusters. By leveraging NFS technology, organizations can effectively store and access data in a distributed and resilient manner, supporting the demands of modern containerized workloads.

The integration of NFS within Kubernetes environments exemplifies the advancement and innovation in storage and data management solutions within the Cloud Native Community. As organizations continue to adopt containerization and Kubernetes for their applications, the availability of robust NFS storage solutions becomes essential for ensuring data persistence, mobility, and accessibility across distributed environments.

Companies providing NFS solutions for Kubernetes play a pivotal role in empowering organizations to effectively manage their data storage requirements within containerized environments. With NFS technology, Kubernetes users can leverage scalable and reliable storage solutions to support their dynamic and evolving application workloads, driving efficiency, agility, and resilience in their cloud-native infrastructures.

Additionally, in the realm of S3 API-compatible storage, various companies offer solutions tailored to the specific needs and requirements of the Cloud Native Community. These companies include NexentaEdge, JetStream Software, vScaler, NetApp Astra, AWS FSx for Lustre, ReadyNAS, Quantum StorNext, Exoscale Object Storage, Infinidat Neutrix Cloud, ScaleIO, Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) Ezmeral Container Platform, and Xendo Storage. AWS FSx for Lustre

AWS FSx for Lustre is a fully managed service that provides high-performance file storage for compute-intensive workloads. It is compatible with Lustre, an open-source parallel file system, and is designed to scale to tens of gigabytes per second of throughput and millions of IOPS. This service is ideal for applications that require high-performance storage, such as machine learning, financial simulations, and electronic design automation. With AWS FSx for Lustre, you can easily provision and scale file storage without the need for dedicated storage administrators. It integrates seamlessly with other AWS services, making it easy to launch and manage Lustre file systems in the cloud. With automated backups, data replication, and encryption at rest, AWS FSx for Lustre ensures that your data is secure and protected. So whether you're running complex simulations or processing large datasets, AWS FSx for Lustre provides the high-performance storage you need to accelerate your workloads and drive innovation.

Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) Ezmeral Container Platform

Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) Ezmeral Container Platform offers a comprehensive solution for container storage within the Cloud Native community. This platform provides seamless integration with various storage solutions to ensure efficient data management and accessibility for containerized applications. With HPE Ezmeral Container Platform, users can leverage a wide range of storage options, including OpenEBS, Rook, Longhorn, Portworx, Ceph, GlusterFS, and StorageOS. These container storage solutions are designed to meet the diverse needs of modern enterprises, offering scalability, reliability, and performance for demanding workloads.

In addition to providing a flexible and robust storage infrastructure, HPE Ezmeral Container Platform also integrates with the Container Storage Interface (CSI) to streamline storage provisioning and management within Kubernetes environments. This integration simplifies the deployment of persistent volumes for containerized applications, ensuring seamless data storage and access across clusters.

Furthermore, HPE Ezmeral Container Platform extends its storage capabilities through partnerships with leading storage vendors, such as NetApp Trident, AWS EBS, Azure Disk Storage, Google Persistent Disk, and Dell EMC PowerFlex. By leveraging these partnerships, users can access a wide range of storage solutions tailored to their specific requirements, whether it's high-performance block storage, scalable object storage, or distributed file systems.

Overall, HPE Ezmeral Container Platform plays a crucial role in enabling organizations to leverage the power of containerized applications while ensuring efficient data storage and management. By offering a comprehensive suite of storage options and seamless integration with Kubernetes environments, this platform empowers enterprises to build and deploy modern applications with confidence and agility.

Their innovative approach to container storage enables organizations to easily scale their storage needs while maintaining high performance and reliability. By leveraging Xendo Storage's services, companies can ensure that their data is always accessible, secure, and optimized for the demands of modern cloud-native applications. With a commitment to excellence and a focus on customer satisfaction, Xendo Storage is a trusted partner for businesses looking to harness the power of container storage in their cloud-native journey.

Database and Data Services

Amazon RDS

Amazon RDS offers a powerful and scalable database solution that is a crucial component of the Cloud Native Community. With Amazon RDS, users can easily set up, operate, and scale relational databases in the cloud, allowing for flexibility and efficiency in managing data. This service provides automated backups, high availability, and enhanced security features, making it an essential tool for businesses looking to streamline their database management processes. By leveraging Amazon RDS, organizations can focus on innovation and growth while ensuring their data is secure and accessible at all times. With its user-friendly interface and robust capabilities, Amazon RDS continues to be a key player in the world of cloud-native technologies.

Azure SQL Database

Azure SQL Database is a fully managed relational database service that provides a wide range of capabilities for building and deploying modern, intelligent applications. With Azure SQL Database, organizations can leverage built-in AI and machine learning features, built-in security and compliance, and industry-leading performance and scalability. Azure SQL Database integrates seamlessly with other Azure services, enabling developers to build fast, responsive applications that can scale dynamically to meet the demands of a global user base. By choosing Azure SQL Database, organizations can take advantage of Microsoft's extensive experience in cloud computing and data management, ensuring that their applications are secure, reliable, and cost-effective.

Google Cloud SQL

Google Cloud SQL is a pivotal part of the Cloud Native Community, offering a robust database service that scales effortlessly to meet the needs of any organization. With Google Cloud SQL, users can rely on a fully-managed SQL database that provides high availability, automatic backups, and seamless replication. This service ensures that data remains secure and accessible at all times, allowing for efficient data management and streamlined operations. Embracing Google Cloud SQL empowers businesses to focus on innovation and growth, with the confidence that their database needs are fully supported by a trusted and reliable platform.

MongoDB Atlas

MongoDB Atlas is a cloud-native database service that offers a comprehensive solution for managing and scaling data storage in the cloud. With MongoDB Atlas, companies can easily provision, operate, and scale their MongoDB databases with just a few clicks. This service is designed to help organizations streamline their data management processes and harness the power of cloud-native technologies to drive innovation and growth. By leveraging MongoDB Atlas, businesses can ensure optimal performance, high availability, and robust security for their data, enabling them to focus on what matters most - delivering value to their customers and driving business success.

Amazon DynamoDB

Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service that provides fast and predictable performance with seamless scalability. It is designed to support key-value and document data structures and offers built-in security, backup and restore, and in-memory caching capabilities. DynamoDB is a popular choice for applications that require low latency and high availability, such as e-commerce platforms, gaming applications, and real-time analytics solutions.

Companies within the Cloud Native Community often utilize Amazon DynamoDB to store and retrieve large amounts of data quickly and efficiently. By leveraging DynamoDB's fully managed service, organizations can focus on developing their applications without worrying about managing the underlying infrastructure. With features like automatic scaling, built-in encryption, and global tables for multi-region replication, DynamoDB offers a reliable and cost-effective solution for storing and accessing data at any scale.

In addition to its core functionality, Amazon DynamoDB integrates seamlessly with other AWS services, such as Lambda for serverless computing, S3 for object storage, and CloudWatch for monitoring and logging. This tight integration allows companies to build robust and scalable applications that can handle variable workloads and adapt to changing business requirements.

Overall, Amazon DynamoDB is a powerful and flexible database service that empowers organizations to build modern, cloud-native applications with ease. Whether storing user profiles, tracking real-time events, or managing product catalogs, DynamoDB provides the performance and reliability needed to support a wide range of use cases in the Cloud Native Community.

Redis Enterprise Cloud

Redis Enterprise Cloud is a key player in the realm of database and data services within the Cloud Native Community. Offering unparalleled scalability, reliability, and performance, Redis Enterprise Cloud has become the go-to solution for organizations seeking cutting-edge data management solutions. With advanced features such as seamless integration, high availability, and automatic failover, Redis Enterprise Cloud stands out as a top choice for businesses looking to optimize their data storage and retrieval processes. Leveraging the power of Redis technology, Redis Enterprise Cloud empowers users to efficiently manage vast amounts of data while ensuring data integrity and security. In a world driven by data-driven decision-making, Redis Enterprise Cloud plays a pivotal role in enabling organizations to harness the full potential of their data resources. With its robust infrastructure and user-friendly interface, Redis Enterprise Cloud continues to set the standard for database management in the cloud-native landscape.

Amazon Aurora

Amazon Aurora is a fully managed relational database service built for the cloud that combines the performance and availability of high-end commercial databases with the simplicity and cost-effectiveness of open-source databases. It is a popular choice among cloud native companies due to its scalability, durability, and compatibility with MySQL and PostgreSQL. With Aurora, you can enjoy up to five times the performance of standard MySQL databases and three times the performance of PostgreSQL databases, making it ideal for applications that require high availability and low latency. Additionally, Amazon Aurora offers automated backups, point-in-time recovery, and multi-region replication, ensuring that your data is always secure and accessible. Its serverless option also allows you to automatically scale your database capacity based on your application's needs, reducing management overhead and costs. Amazon Aurora is a powerful and flexible database solution that empowers cloud native companies to build and scale their applications with confidence.

PostgreSQL on AWS

PostgreSQL on AWS is a highly reliable and scalable database service that offers advanced features for managing your data. With AWS's PostgreSQL offering, you can easily provision, scale, and manage your PostgreSQL databases in the cloud.

This service is designed to handle large volumes of data and high-performance workloads, making it ideal for businesses of all sizes. With features like automated backups, automated failover, and encryption at rest, you can be confident that your data is secure and always available.

AWS's PostgreSQL on AWS service also integrates seamlessly with other AWS services, allowing you to build powerful and scalable applications. Whether you're running a small blog or a large-scale enterprise application, PostgreSQL on AWS has the capabilities to meet your needs.

By leveraging PostgreSQL on AWS, you can focus on developing your applications without worrying about managing the underlying infrastructure. With AWS's reliable and secure platform, you can trust that your data is in good hands.

Choose PostgreSQL on AWS for a powerful and flexible database solution that can grow with your business. With AWS's robust infrastructure and PostgreSQL's proven capabilities, you can take your applications to the next level with confidence.

Azure Cosmos DB

Azure Cosmos DB, part of Microsoft's cloud offering, is a globally distributed, multi-model database service designed to provide elastic scalability and high availability. It supports multiple data models, including document, key-value, graph, and column-family, allowing for flexible and efficient data storage and retrieval. With guaranteed single-digit millisecond latency and comprehensive SLAs for consistency, throughput, and availability, Azure Cosmos DB is ideal for mission-critical applications requiring fast and reliable access to data. Powered by Microsoft's global network of data centers, Azure Cosmos DB offers seamless scaling and replication across regions, ensuring that data is always close to users for optimal performance. Whether it's managing large volumes of data for real-time analytics or building responsive applications with low latency, Azure Cosmos DB provides a powerful, scalable, and reliable solution for modern data management in the cloud-native community.

Google Cloud Bigtable

Google Cloud Bigtable is a high-performance NoSQL database service ideal for large analytical and operational workloads. It is designed to handle massive amounts of data with low-latency access, making it suitable for applications that require real-time insights and data processing. Google Cloud Bigtable offers scalability, reliability, and ease of management, allowing businesses to focus on deriving value from their data rather than worrying about infrastructure maintenance. With its integration with other Google Cloud services, Bigtable provides a seamless environment for building and deploying data-intensive applications at scale.

CockroachDB

CockroachDB is a distributed SQL database that provides linear scalability and strong consistency across multiple nodes. It is designed to handle large volumes of data with high availability and fault tolerance. CockroachDB is well suited for cloud-native applications that require a robust and reliable database solution. By leveraging distribution and replication, CockroachDB ensures that data is always available and consistent, even in the event of node failures or network partitions. With its SQL interface and ACID compliance, CockroachDB is a powerful and versatile database that can handle the demands of modern cloud-native applications.

CockroachLabs

CockroachLabs is a key player in the Cloud Native Community when it comes to Database and Data Services. They offer a comprehensive range of services and offerings that cater to the needs of the community. With a focus on scalability, resilience, and high availability, CockroachLabs ensures that organizations can rely on their database solutions to meet the demands of their modern applications. By leveraging innovative technologies and best practices, CockroachLabs stands out as a leader in the industry, providing cutting-edge solutions that drive digital transformation and empower businesses to thrive in the cloud-native era.

Apache Cassandra

Apache Cassandra is a highly scalable, distributed database management system that is part of the Cloud Native Community. It offers a robust and fault-tolerant architecture, making it an ideal choice for organizations dealing with large volumes of data. Companies such as DataStax and Instaclustr offer managed services for Apache Cassandra, providing customers with the expertise and support needed to leverage the full potential of this powerful database technology. With features like tunable consistency levels, built-in replication, and support for linear scalability, Apache Cassandra is well-suited for modern cloud-native applications that require high availability and performance. Combined with cloud-native storage solutions like Amazon EBS or Azure Disk Storage, Apache Cassandra provides a reliable foundation for storing and accessing mission-critical data in the cloud. By embracing Apache Cassandra as part of their data management strategy, organizations can effectively harness the power of cloud-native technologies to meet their evolving business needs.

Elasticsearch Service

Elasticsearch Service is a critical component in the realm of data storage and management within the Cloud Native Community. With a wide array of features and capabilities, Elasticsearch Service offers companies the ability to efficiently store and analyze vast amounts of data in real-time. This service plays a crucial role in ensuring that organizations can harness the power of their data to make informed decisions and drive business success.

As part of the comprehensive exposition of companies within the Cloud Native Community, Elasticsearch Service stands out for its robust search and analytics capabilities. By leveraging Elasticsearch Service, companies can not only store their data securely but also retrieve and analyze it with ease. This service empowers organizations to gain valuable insights from their data, enhancing their ability to innovate and adapt to changing market conditions.

Moreover, Elasticsearch Service is known for its scalability and reliability, making it a trusted solution for companies of all sizes. Whether a startup looking to build a strong data foundation or a multinational corporation handling petabytes of information, Elasticsearch Service provides the flexibility and performance needed to meet diverse business requirements.

In summary, Elasticsearch Service is a cornerstone of data storage and management within the Cloud Native Community. By offering powerful search and analytics capabilities, scalable infrastructure, and unmatched reliability, this service enables organizations to unlock the full potential of their data assets and drive success in today's dynamic business landscape.

IBM Db2 on Cloud

IBM Db2 on Cloud is a robust and secure cloud database service that offers high availability and scalability for your data needs. With IBM Db2 on Cloud, you can easily manage and access your data with advanced features such as encryption, compression, and automatic backups. This service is ideal for organizations looking to streamline their data management processes and leverage the power of cloud technology. By using IBM Db2 on Cloud, you can ensure that your data is always secure, reliable, and accessible whenever you need it. With its flexible pricing options and comprehensive support, IBM Db2 on Cloud is a top choice for businesses looking to optimize their data storage and management strategies.

Oracle Autonomous Database

Oracle Autonomous Database is a cutting-edge database service that eliminates the complexity of database management. It uses machine learning to provide automatic performance tuning, security updates, and backups, allowing organizations to focus on innovation rather than administration. Oracle Autonomous Database offers both transaction processing and data warehousing capabilities, catering to a wide range of business requirements. With its self-driving, self-securing, and self-repairing features, Oracle Autonomous Database sets a new standard for simplicity and reliability in the cloud-native community. Organizations leveraging Oracle Autonomous Database can benefit from enhanced productivity, improved security, and reduced operational costs, making it a valuable asset in today's fast-paced digital landscape.

MariaDB SkySQL

MariaDB SkySQL is a leading provider of database and data services within the Cloud Native Community. SkySQL offers a comprehensive range of features and functionalities to support the diverse needs of organizations operating in cloud environments. With MariaDB SkySQL, users can benefit from advanced data management capabilities, high availability, scalability, and security features to ensure the integrity and performance of their databases. Additionally, SkySQL provides seamless integration with various cloud platforms, enabling users to leverage the power of the cloud for their data management needs. Overall, MariaDB SkySQL is a valuable asset for organizations looking to optimize their data infrastructure in the cloud-native ecosystem.

YugabyteDB

YugabyteDB is an open-source, cloud-native distributed SQL database designed to provide high performance, scalability, and resilience for modern applications. With YugabyteDB, developers can easily build applications that require real-time analytics, high availability, and low latency. The database is built on top of a distributed architecture that allows it to scale horizontally across multiple nodes, ensuring that data is always available and consistent.

One of the key features of YugabyteDB is its ability to support a wide range of data models, including relational, semi-structured, and time-series data. This flexibility makes it ideal for a variety of use cases, from transaction processing to analytics. YugabyteDB also offers advanced features such as distributed ACID transactions, automatic failover, and multi-region deployment, making it a reliable choice for mission-critical applications.

In addition to its robust feature set, YugabyteDB is fully compatible with popular SQL query languages such as PostgreSQL, allowing developers to leverage their existing skills and tools. This compatibility makes it easy to migrate existing applications to YugabyteDB without any major changes to the codebase. Overall, YugabyteDB is a powerful and versatile database solution that empowers developers to build and scale cloud-native applications with ease and confidence.

Couchbase Cloud

Couchbase Cloud offers a scalable and flexible database solution for cloud-native applications, providing high availability, performance, and ease of use. As part of the Cloud Native Community, Couchbase Cloud enables developers to seamlessly deploy, manage, and scale their databases in the cloud, allowing for rapid development and deployment of applications. With features such as automatic sharding, in-memory caching, and multi-dimensional scaling, Couchbase Cloud empowers developers to build robust and resilient applications that can handle large volumes of data and user requests. By leveraging the power of Couchbase Cloud, developers can focus on innovating and delivering value to their users without worrying about the complexities of database management.

TimescaleDB

TimescaleDB is a powerful database management system that offers advanced features for storing and managing time-series data efficiently. It is a popular choice among companies in the Cloud Native Community for its scalability, reliability, and performance. With TimescaleDB, users can easily query and analyze large volumes of time-stamped data, making it ideal for applications that require real-time monitoring, forecasting, and trend analysis. By leveraging TimescaleDB, organizations can ensure data integrity, availability, and security while optimizing their data storage and retrieval processes. With its seamless integration with other cloud services and platforms, TimescaleDB provides a comprehensive solution for companies looking to harness the power of time-series data in the cloud-native environment.

DataStax Astra is a leading database service provider in the Cloud Native Community, offering a wide range of services to meet the diverse needs of organizations. With DataStax Astra, companies can seamlessly manage their data with efficiency and scalability. By harnessing the power of DataStax Astra, businesses can unlock new opportunities for growth and innovation. Redis Cloud

Redis Cloud is a reliable and scalable database service that is an integral part of the Cloud Native Community. It offers a range of services to the community, providing easy access to powerful database capabilities. With Redis Cloud, companies can leverage high-performance data storage and retrieval for their cloud-native applications. This service ensures data integrity, availability, and security, allowing organizations to focus on innovation and growth without worrying about the complexities of managing databases. FaunaDB

FaunaDB is a dynamic player in the Cloud Native Community, offering a cutting-edge database service that is revolutionizing the way data is managed and accessed in modern applications. With its fully managed, serverless architecture, FaunaDB provides developers with a scalable and flexible solution for storing and querying data, all while ensuring high availability and seamless integration with other cloud services. By leveraging FaunaDB, companies can streamline their development processes, reduce operational complexity, and deliver exceptional user experiences. As a part of the Cloud Native Community, FaunaDB is committed to pushing the boundaries of what is possible with cloud-native technologies, driving innovation and empowering businesses to thrive in the digital age.

Firebase Realtime Database

Firebase Realtime Database, offered by Google Cloud, is a fully managed NoSQL database with real-time data syncing and offline support, making it ideal for mobile and web applications. It allows developers to store and sync data across all clients in real-time, providing a seamless user experience. With Firebase Realtime Database, developers can focus on building their applications without worrying about managing servers or scaling infrastructure. This database service is secure, scalable, and reliable, offering automatic multi-region data replication for high availability and low latency. With Firebase Realtime Database, developers can build responsive and collaborative applications that keep data in sync across all devices, providing a seamless user experience.

InfluxDB Cloud

"InfluxDB Cloud is a cloud-native time series database service that offers high-performance storage and retrieval of time-stamped data. It provides scalable and reliable storage for metrics, events, and other time-based data, making it ideal for monitoring, IoT, and real-time analytics applications. InfluxDB Cloud offers a fully managed service with automatic scaling, data replication, and backup to ensure data availability and reliability. With built-in integrations with popular data sources and visualization tools, it streamlines data collection, analysis, and visualization workflows. InfluxDB Cloud is part of the comprehensive ecosystem of cloud-native technologies designed to empower organizations in building, deploying, and managing modern, scalable applications in the cloud. By leveraging the capabilities of InfluxDB Cloud, businesses can unlock new insights from their time series data and drive innovation in their data-driven strategies."

Heroku Postgres

Heroku Postgres is a fully managed relational database service built for fast, simple data storage and retrieval. With Heroku Postgres, users can effortlessly scale their databases as needed, ensuring optimal performance and reliability for their applications. This service offers seamless integration with the Heroku platform, making it easy to deploy and manage databases with minimal effort. Heroku Postgres provides a variety of plans to suit different use cases, from small personal projects to enterprise-level applications requiring high availability and performance. Whether you're building a new application or migrating an existing one, Heroku Postgres offers a robust, secure, and scalable solution for all your data storage needs within the Cloud Native Community.

DigitalOcean Managed Databases

DigitalOcean Managed Databases provides a reliable, fully managed database service that offers high availability, automatic backups, and scaling capabilities. With support for popular database engines like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Redis, DigitalOcean Managed Databases simplifies the deployment and maintenance of databases for developers and businesses. By offering a seamless experience and flexible pricing options, DigitalOcean Managed Databases empowers users to focus on building their applications without worrying about the complexities of database management. Joining the Cloud Native Community, DigitalOcean continues to enhance its services to meet the evolving needs of modern applications and infrastructure.

Cloudera CDP

Cloudera CDP, a prominent player in the Cloud Native Community, offers a wide range of database and data services for organizations looking to optimize their storage and data management solutions. With a focus on innovation and efficiency, Cloudera CDP provides cutting-edge technologies and services that cater to the diverse needs of modern businesses. By leveraging Cloudera CDP's expertise and resources, companies can enhance their data storage, management, and analysis capabilities, ensuring seamless operations and decision-making processes. Databricks Unified Data Analytics Platform

The Databricks Unified Data Analytics Platform offers a comprehensive range of database and data services tailored to meet the diverse needs of the Cloud Native Community. With the ability to seamlessly integrate with other cloud services and scalable solutions, Databricks provides a versatile and efficient approach to data management and analytics. By leveraging the platform, organizations can optimize their data storage, processing, and analysis capabilities, ultimately driving informed decision-making and actionable insights. Whether it's leveraging Apache Kafka for event streaming, utilizing Apache Nifi for data ingestion, or harnessing the power of Apache Pulsar for data processing, Databricks empowers companies to extract maximum value from their data assets. With a focus on reliability, performance, and security, Databricks stands out as a key player in the Cloud Native Community, providing robust tools and services to address the ever-evolving data analytics landscape.

Snowflake

Snowflake is a cloud data platform that provides a fully managed service for data warehousing, data lakes, data engineering, data integration, data sharing, and data applications. With Snowflake, organizations can easily and securely store, manage, and analyze their data in the cloud. Snowflake's architecture separates storage and compute, allowing customers to scale their compute resources independently of the data they are querying. This architecture also enables Snowflake to offer automatic scaling, instant elasticity, and pay-per-use pricing, making it a cost-effective solution for organizations of all sizes. Additionally, Snowflake provides built-in support for semi-structured data formats like JSON, Avro, Parquet, and ORC, making it easy to work with different types of data. Snowflake is also known for its performance optimizations, including query optimization, automatic indexing, and workload management, ensuring fast and efficient data processing. Overall, Snowflake's comprehensive suite of services and offerings make it a valuable asset for organizations looking to harness the power of cloud data analytics.

Teradata Vantage

Teradata Vantage, a leading player in the realm of Database and Data Services within the Cloud Native Community, offers a comprehensive suite of services and solutions aimed at empowering organizations to harness the power of data for unparalleled insights and decision-making capabilities. With Teradata Vantage, businesses can seamlessly integrate, analyze, and act on their data, leveraging cutting-edge technology to drive innovation and competitive advantage. Through its robust infrastructure and advanced analytics tools, Teradata Vantage enables businesses to unlock the full potential of their data, driving growth, efficiency, and agility in an increasingly complex and data-driven world. Teradata Vantage stands as a stalwart partner for organizations seeking to navigate the ever-evolving landscape of data management and analytics, delivering unparalleled performance, scalability, and security to meet the most demanding data challenges of today and tomorrow.

Yellowbrick Data Warehouse

Yellowbrick is a company that offers a high-performance data warehouse solution that is built for the most demanding workloads. It provides a scalable, distributed architecture that allows organizations to analyze massive amounts of data quickly and efficiently. With Yellowbrick, users can run complex queries, perform real-time analytics, and generate actionable insights from their data in record time. The company's data warehouse is designed to handle petabytes of data and deliver fast query performance, making it ideal for organizations with large and complex data sets. Additionally, Yellowbrick offers advanced security features to ensure that data is protected at every stage of the analytics process. Overall, Yellowbrick's data warehouse solution is a powerful tool for organizations looking to unlock the full potential of their data and drive business growth.

Apache HBase

Apache HBase is an open-source, distributed, versioned, and non-relational database modeled after Google's Bigtable. It is designed to provide scalable, consistent, and high-performance storage for large-scale, distributed systems. Apache HBase is a part of the Cloud Native Community, offering a robust solution for managing massive amounts of data in a distributed environment. Companies such as Amazon RDS, Azure SQL Database, Google Cloud SQL, and many others leverage Apache HBase to support their data storage needs. With its seamless scalability and efficient processing capabilities, Apache HBase plays a critical role in enabling organizations to effectively manage and analyze their data in the cloud-native ecosystem.

IBM Cloudant

IBM Cloudant offers a scalable, fully-managed database service that is designed to handle both structured and unstructured data. As part of the Cloud Native Community, IBM Cloudant provides a distributed database that can seamlessly scale to accommodate large volumes of data and high transaction rates. By leveraging a combination of NoSQL and SQL capabilities, IBM Cloudant offers developers the flexibility to store, retrieve, and query data in a way that best suits their specific application requirements. With built-in replication and sync features, IBM Cloudant ensures data integrity and availability across multiple regions. Overall, IBM Cloudant is a valuable asset to the Cloud Native Community, offering a reliable and efficient database solution for modern cloud-based applications.

Microsoft Access

Microsoft Access is a relational database management system that is part of the extensive suite of Microsoft Office applications. It provides users with the ability to easily create and manage databases for various purposes, such as tracking inventory, storing customer information, or analyzing business data. With its user-friendly interface and powerful features, Microsoft Access has become a popular choice for businesses and individuals looking to organize and analyze their data effectively. Its seamless integration with other Microsoft Office applications allows for a smooth workflow and efficient data management. By leveraging Microsoft Access, users can create custom forms, reports, and queries to meet their specific needs, making it a valuable tool for data storage and analysis within the Cloud Native Community.

Azure Synapse Analytics

Azure Synapse Analytics is a powerful cloud-based service that brings together big data and data warehousing into a unified and integrated platform. With support for SQL and Apache Spark, Azure Synapse Analytics provides a seamless experience for analytics, data processing, and machine learning. Companies leveraging Azure Synapse Analytics benefit from improved scalability, flexibility, and performance, enabling them to analyze massive datasets and make data-driven decisions faster than ever before. Azure Synapse Analytics is a key player in the Cloud Native Community, offering a wide range of services and features that cater to the diverse needs of organizations looking to harness the power of their data. By simplifying the complexities of big data management and analysis, Azure Synapse Analytics empowers businesses to unlock valuable insights and drive innovation in today's data-driven world.

Hazelcast Jet

Hazelcast Jet is a data processing engine that is specifically designed for accelerating real-time data processing within cloud native environments. It provides a highly scalable and fault-tolerant platform for executing distributed data processing tasks with low latency and high throughput. Hazelcast Jet offers a rich set of features such as stateful stream processing, fault tolerance, and high availability, making it an ideal solution for building real-time data pipelines and analytics applications in the cloud.

By leveraging the power of in-memory computing and parallel processing, Hazelcast Jet enables organizations to process large volumes of data quickly and efficiently, making it a valuable tool for data-intensive applications in the cloud native ecosystem. With Hazelcast Jet, organizations can easily build and deploy data processing pipelines that can scale horizontally to handle increasing data volumes and processing demands, ensuring high performance and reliability for critical business operations.

In addition to its advanced data processing capabilities, Hazelcast Jet also offers seamless integration with other cloud native services and platforms, allowing organizations to leverage the full potential of their cloud infrastructure. With Hazelcast Jet, organizations can easily connect to various data sources, orchestrate complex data processing workflows, and analyze large datasets in real time, empowering them to make informed business decisions based on up-to-date insights.

Overall, Hazelcast Jet plays a crucial role in the storage and data management landscape of the cloud native community, providing organizations with a powerful and flexible solution for processing real-time data at scale. With its robust features and seamless integration capabilities, Hazelcast Jet is a key enabler for organizations looking to harness the full potential of cloud native technologies for their data processing needs.

CockroachDB Cloud

CockroachDB Cloud

CockroachDB Cloud is a cloud-native database service that offers distributed SQL for building, scaling, and managing global applications. With CockroachDB Cloud, developers can benefit from horizontal scalability, high availability, and strong consistency across multiple regions. This database service is designed to handle the challenges of modern, distributed applications, providing a reliable and scalable solution for cloud-native environments.

One of the key features of CockroachDB Cloud is its ability to automatically handle failover and recovery, ensuring that applications remain up and running even in the face of hardware failures or network interruptions. By leveraging a distributed architecture, CockroachDB Cloud can seamlessly scale out to meet growing demand and provide consistent performance across geographically distributed deployments.

With built-in security features such as encryption at rest and in transit, CockroachDB Cloud helps organizations meet compliance requirements and protect their data from unauthorized access. Additionally, CockroachDB Cloud offers integrations with popular tools and platforms, making it easy for developers to incorporate this database service into their existing workflows.

For organizations looking to harness the power of distributed SQL in the cloud, CockroachDB Cloud offers a robust and reliable solution that can scale with their business needs. By leveraging the capabilities of CockroachDB Cloud, developers can build and operate cloud-native applications with confidence, knowing that their data is secure, available, and scalable.

Neo4j Aura

With a focus on scalability, flexibility, and performance, Neo4j Aura empowers organizations to manage their data with ease and efficiency. Microsoft SQL Server

Microsoft SQL Server is a key player in the field of database and data services within the Cloud Native Community. As part of its offerings, Microsoft SQL Server provides a robust and reliable platform for managing and analyzing data in a cloud-native environment. The features and capabilities of Microsoft SQL Server make it a preferred choice for businesses looking to harness the power of data for their operations. By leveraging Microsoft SQL Server, companies can ensure the integrity and availability of their data while driving innovation and growth in the digital landscape.

Apache Hive

Apache Hive is a powerful data warehouse infrastructure built on top of Apache Hadoop for providing data summarization, query, and analysis. It allows you to query and manage large datasets residing in distributed storage. Hive provides a SQL-like interface to query data stored in various databases and file systems that integrate efficiently with Hadoop. This makes it easier for users familiar with SQL to write Hive queries and process data.

As part of the Cloud Native Community, Apache Hive plays a crucial role in enabling organizations to leverage big data technologies for analytics and business intelligence. Companies like Cloudera, Hortonworks, and Databricks have integrated Apache Hive into their platforms to provide robust data warehousing capabilities for their customers. These companies offer managed solutions that simplify the deployment and management of Apache Hive clusters, making it easier for organizations to harness the power of big data analytics.

With Apache Hive, organizations can store, manage, and analyze massive volumes of data in distributed environments, enabling them to derive valuable insights and make data-driven decisions. By leveraging Apache Hive as part of their data analytics stack, companies can unlock the potential of their data and drive innovation in their businesses. Apache Hive continues to be a key player in the data analytics landscape, providing scalability, flexibility, and performance for processing complex queries on large datasets in the cloud-native ecosystem.

Treasure Data

In the realm of database and data services in the Cloud Native Community, Treasure Data stands out as a formidable player, offering cutting-edge solutions for businesses seeking efficient data management and analytics. With Treasure Data, companies can harness the power of cloud-based storage and processing to unlock valuable insights from their data, enabling informed decision-making and strategic planning. By leveraging Treasure Data's services, organizations can seamlessly integrate data streams, event streaming, and real-time analytics to stay ahead in today's fast-paced digital landscape. Offering a powerful and robust solution for storing and managing vast amounts of data, MapR Database stands out for its reliability, scalability, and performance. With support for various data types and formats, MapR Database caters to a wide range of data management needs, making it a versatile and valuable tool for organizations looking to harness the power of their data. TIBCO Data Virtualization

TIBCO Data Virtualization is a key player in the realm of database and data services within the vast landscape of cloud-native technology. By offering a comprehensive platform for data virtualization, TIBCO enables organizations to seamlessly integrate and access data from disparate sources, creating a unified view of information for enhanced decision-making. With TIBCO Data Virtualization, companies can optimize their data management processes, reduce redundancy, and increase operational efficiency. This innovative solution empowers businesses to unlock the full potential of their data assets, driving competitiveness and innovation in the dynamic digital era. TIBCO's commitment to excellence in data virtualization services makes them a valuable contributor to the Cloud Native Community, shaping the future of data-driven insights for organizations worldwide.

CouchDB

CouchDB is a widely used database service within the Cloud Native Community, offering a scalable and flexible NoSQL database solution. It provides a distributed architecture that allows for seamless integration with cloud environments, making it a popular choice for applications requiring high availability and fault tolerance. With CouchDB, developers can easily store, retrieve, and manage their data in a schema-less fashion, allowing for quick iterations and adaptability to changing data structures. Its built-in replication and synchronization capabilities make it an ideal choice for applications that require real-time data updates across multiple locations. Additionally, CouchDB's built-in MapReduce functionality enables efficient query processing and data analysis, making it a versatile solution for a wide range of use cases within the Cloud Native ecosystem.

CassandraDB

CassandraDB is one of the key players in the realm of database and data services within the Cloud Native Community. Known for its scalable and highly available architecture, CassandraDB offers a distributed database management system that excels in handling large amounts of data with low latency. Companies leveraging CassandraDB can benefit from its flexibility, fault tolerance, and linear scalability, making it a popular choice for organizations dealing with massive datasets in real-time applications. With its robust features and proven track record, CassandraDB continues to be a cornerstone in the world of cloud-native database solutions.

PrestoSQL

PrestoSQL is a leading database service provider in the Cloud Native Community, offering efficient and scalable solutions for data management. With PrestoSQL, organizations can handle massive volumes of data with ease, ensuring high performance and reliability. By leveraging PrestoSQL's advanced capabilities, businesses can optimize their data infrastructure and drive innovation in the digital landscape. PrestoSQL is a trusted partner for companies looking to make the most of their data resources and unlock new opportunities for growth and success.

Advanced SQL Engine

When it comes to database and data services in the realm of storage and data management within the Cloud Native community, there is a wide array of companies offering their services to meet the diverse needs of users. Companies such as Amazon RDS, Azure SQL Database, Google Cloud SQL, MongoDB Atlas, Amazon DynamoDB, Redis Enterprise Cloud, and many others provide a range of solutions to store and manage data efficiently. Each of these companies brings unique features and capabilities to the table, enabling users to choose the best fit for their specific requirements. With the rise of data-driven decision-making and the increasing complexity of data storage and management, the services offered by these companies play a crucial role in facilitating seamless operations and driving innovation in the cloud-native ecosystem.

Stardog is a leading provider of data management software that empowers organizations to unlock the value of their data through knowledge graphs. By leveraging artificial intelligence and machine learning, Stardog enables businesses to integrate, store, and query data across diverse sources with ease.
